Lord Caitanya, although Krishna Himself, appealed to His friends and helpers to help Him in His mission and what to speak of me; I am just an ordinary human being. So I need your help.

Letter to Yogesvara, June 12, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 11
body:
When the living entity turns to Krsna, then Krsna will help from within the heart. How does he make that turn? What is that turning point? That turning begins when he actually hears the message of Godhead. By hearing the message of Godhead from a devotee, he turns his attention to the Lord. A devotee prays to the Lord, who is in the heart, “Please help them to hear Your message. This is Your message, I am simply Your servant.”

June 11, 1996, Krasnodar
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 12
body:
If a Vaishnava, by the mercy of the Lord, is empowered by Him to distribute the Lord’s Holy Name all over the world, other Vaishnavas become very joyful—that is, if they are truly Vaishnavas.

June 12, 2000, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 13
body:
I can see you, you can see me, similarly, you can go directly, see God and live with Him, dance with Him, play with Him, eat with Him. That is the perfection of life.

Paris, June 13, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 13
body:
First there is duty, which has to be there. But, ultimately, devotional service is beyond that. The natural function of the soul is to serve spontaneously out of love and with an exclusive desire to please Krsna. That is the natural characteristic of the soul, which needs to be restored.

June 13, 2009, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 14
body:
Vrindaban does not require to be modernized because Krishna's Vrindaban is transcendental village. They completely depend on nature's beauty and nature's protection. The community in which Krishna preferred to belong was Vaisya community, because Nanda Maharaja happened to be a Vaisya king, or landholder, and his main business was cow protection. It is understood that he had 900,000 cows and Krishna and Balarama used to take charge of them, along with His many cowherd boy friends, and every day, in the morning He used to go out with His friends and cows into the pasturing grounds.

Letter to Hayagriva, June 14, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 14
body:
Because all living entities have a relationship with the Supreme, their oneness is the understanding of that relationship. They also have the oneness with each other. Their oneness is that they all are servants of the Supreme.

June 14, 1995, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 15
body:
Spiritual master is representative of God, similarly, king is also representative of God. The father is also representative of God. These are the statements of the sastras. Because they will guide. The king will guide. The spiritual master will guide. The father will guide. What is that guidance? That guidance is how one can become Krishna conscious by education, by culture.

Mayapur, June 15, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 15
body:
It is not initiation that brings the disciple back to Godhead. It is the connection between the disciple and the spiritual master, based on how the disciple is hearing the instructions of the spiritual master. Then his connection is strong and the spiritual master can help him recover his Krsna consciousness.

June 15, 1996, Nikolaev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 16
body:
If you take one cent from somebody else without doing something good to him or without exchanging something, then you are debtor, and you have to pay him with interest and compound interest. That is the law of karma.

New Vrindavan, June 16, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 16
body:
If one loses faith in the process of chanting the Holy Name of the Lord, then they have to cry. Tears should come from their eyes. They should pray and cry to Krsna “Please do whatever is necessary to restore my faith in the Holy Name of the Lord.” These tears are the price one has to pay to stay under the protection of the internal potency. Without these tears in one's eyes and a desire for the Lord's protection, Prabhupada states that maya can take you at any moment.

June 16, 2002, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 17
body:
Horse is controlled by the mouth. Therefore you have seen the harnesses are fixed in the mouth, the driver controls the mouth and the horse goes. So Krishna was a boy. How did He know that "This demon Kesi has come in the shape of a horse. If I have to control him, I will have to control his mouth". So He pushed His hand within the mouth of the horse, and the horse felt it was just like a hot iron bar, so he died. Similarly, when Krishna fought with Aristasura, He knew that to control the bull you have to control the horns, so He took up the horns and killed him. This is svabhaviki, natural. He knows everything.

Mayapura, June 17, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 17
body:
When one wants to acquire some taste for hearing and chanting then one has to faithfully serve the devotees. Because by serving them and being in their association, then one develops some taste. Why is the taste not there? Because heart is still impure. Therefore we can not relish the full essence, the full benefit, of the Holy Name of the Lord.

June 17, 2000, Donetsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 18
body:
You are mine and I am Krishna's, therefore you are also Krishna's.

Letter to Gargamuni, June 18, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 18
body:
Qualified brahmanas have the ability to see how things can be properly utilized for the service of the Lord because they are detached. Because they detached, humble and tolerant, they are able to offer whatever they have in sacrifice and to give whatever they have in their possession in charity.

June 18, 1998, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 19
body:
If there is lack of obedience then there cannot be discipline, and without discipline we cannot manage a huge world organization.

Los Angeles, June 19, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 19
body:
There is a certain symptom that manifests in one who is sheltered. If they are able to face adversity without being disturbed and are able to go on serving, they are taking shelter of the Holy Name of the Lord without any material consideration.

June 19, 2004, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 20
body:
There is a big difference between service and devotional service. Because everybody is serving and not everybody is a pure devotee of the Lord. If we actually talk about the word service and don’t include the word devotion, then we can understand why we are not experiencing satisfaction.

June 20, 1996, Kishinev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 20
body:
In Vrindavana, when we walk on the street, the cartsmen, the milkmen carrying milk, immediately they'll offer namaskar, "Swamiji". The other day we were walking and we entered one field, just for walking. So the villagers, the cultivators, they came to congratulate us and receive us. "Swamiji, it is our great fortune that you have come to our field". But in your country if I would have entered in another's place, perhaps they would have brought charge of trespass or might have shot us down. So that is the different system. That by birthright they are Krishna conscious in Vrinvadan.

Toronto, June 20, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 21
body:
A Spiritual Master is always liberated. In any condition of His life He should not be mistaken as ordinary human being. This position of a Spiritual Master is achieved by three processes: Sadhana siddha - one who is liberated by executing the regulative principle of devotional service; Krpa siddha - one who is liberated by the mercy of Krsna or His devotee; Nitya siddha - one who is never forgetful of Krsna throughout his whole life. These are the three features of the perfection of life.

Letter to Tamala Krsna, June 21, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 21
body:
Krsna's mercy is available for everyone. We should accept that mercy and allow Krsna to deal with us as He chooses. However Krsna deals with us is always for our benefit. Therefore, the devotee always prays “Krsna, I am dependent only on You. If You give or if You take away, I will be happy as long as it is You.” This is how to remember Krsna. This is Krsna consciousness.

June 21, 2005, Donetsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 22
body:
In the Vedic conception of Grhastha, householder, it is recommended that a householder shall see that even a lizard living in the room or even a snake living in that house should not starve. They should be also given food. And what to speak of others?

Conversation with prof. Kotovsky, June 22, 1971, Moscow
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 22
body:
The most important service is chanting, and it should never be neglected. Everything else, such as cooking, cleaning, driving, distributing books, etc, is all meant to increase our attachment to the Holy Name. When you meditate on the Holy Name in this way, you will get strength to go on with your service.

June 22, 2001, Irkutsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 23
body:
The disciple's duty is to be ready always to serve the spiritual master, at any cost.

Los Angeles, June 23, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 23
body:
We should maintain complete faith that, whatever Krsna's plan is, it is perfect. If Krsna wishes to take me back home, back to Godhead, then why should I resist? If Krsna wants me to stay in the material world and preach Krisna Consciousness, then certainly He will give the facility for me to spread His glories. Whatever Krsna's plan is, I will accept it. I know one thing only and that is, I want to keep Krsna in the center of my life. If we work in this consciousness, that will invoke the mercy of the Lord and we will be able to see the Lord's plan unfold before our eyes. This is Krsna Consciousness.

June 23, 1996, Vinnitsa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 24
body:
If the wife is helpful in the spiritual progress of life, she is the best friend and philosopher. So in Krishna Consciousness the wife is never a burden, but she is completely a counterpart.

Letter to Vrindavan Candra, 24 June,1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 24
body:
The spiritual master is the representative of the Supreme Lord. Therefore his instructions should be taken in full faith. If one wants to have full faith in the Holy Name of the Lord, then certainly one must have full faith in the spiritual master who was given the Holy Name of the Lord to his disciple.

June 24, 2001, Vladivostok
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 25
body:
As soon as you offer yourself to be enjoyed by Krishna as servant, according to His order you serve, then immediately you are in the spiritual world. If you want to remain in the spiritual world, this temple is the spiritual world. We are not living in Melbourne. This temple is not Melbourne. It is Vaikuntha. It is Vrindavana. So if you stick to this temple service, Krishna's service, then you are not in this material world.

Melbourne, June 25, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 25
body:
The process of bhakti yoga is both easy and sublime because it is natural. Other types of yoga endeavor for perfection by performing severe austerities and penances. However, they don’t get the assistance of the Lord because they are not dependent upon the Lord. When a devotee takes process of the devotional service and becomes completely dependent upon the Lord, the Lord makes it easy for the devotee.

June 25, 1990, Ijory
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 26
body:
Innocent men, women, they are kept in that factory simply for livelihood. A little work will provide his needs. Nature has given so much facility. They can grow little food anywhere. The cows are there in the pasturing ground. Take milk and live peacefully. Why you open factories?

New Vrindavana, June 26, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 26
body:
We can understand that although the Lord does not personally experience distress, He experiences that distress which is in the heart of His devotees. His devotees are so dear to Him that He knows everything that is going in their hearts. Therefore, when the devotees feel distress for others' suffering, the Lord feels it. Such is the power of the devotees' love. They can invoke the Lord's mercy. This is vaishnava. He is para-dukha-dukhi.

June 26, 2005, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 27
body:
It we try to avoid obstacles, then we must be very careful, because at the same time, we may be avoiding the instruction of the spiritual master. Because the spiritual master has given some instruction which requires surrender in our part, we may see some difficulty and start speculating “Oh, what is Krsna telling me? Maybe Krsna is telling me that I shouldn’t do this.” It is not Krsna speaking to us, it is Maya whispering into our ear “Don’t surrender to Krsna”.

June 27, 1995, Dnepropetrovsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 27
body:
When our eyes are anointed with love of God, we can see Him everywhere. We have to develop our seeing power by developing love of Godhead. When one is sufficiently developed in Krishna consciousness, he can see the Lord every moment within his heart and everywhere, wherever he goes.

San Francisco, June 27, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 29
body:
One old man and his wife, sitting together. The wife is requesting the old husband, "Chant, chant, chant", and the husband is replying:"Can't, can't, can't". This cartoon we have seen. He will say three times:"Can't, can't, can't". But not "Krishna, Krishna, Krishna".

Mayapura, June 29, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 29
body:
The first step is to develop a fear of maya. This is not the ultimate motivation for the devotional service, but motivates us to take shelter of the process of devotional service. Then, by chanting more and more, gradually a taste awakens within the heart and one develops a natural, genuine desire.

June 29, 2004, Suharevo
author: Niranjana Swami

title: June 30
body:
As God is good, we are also good. But due to our material association, we have become bad. So if we revive our old position, Krsna consciousness, then automatically we shall become all-good.

Calcutta, June 30, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: June 30
body:
The word diyatam means that knowledge of Krsna consciousness should be offered by the spiritual master. That is his only interest – to give knowledge. The accepting the service from disciples is secondary. He accepts service from disciples only so that they can become qualified receptacles for that knowledge.

June 30, 1998, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 1
body:
It is good to be prepared with a well-thought lecture in advance. However, we must be able to preach effectively at a moment’s notice or under any conditions or circumstances also. As you begin to study the Sanskrit words, in each word you will find a treasure house of different understanding.

Letter to Satsvarupa, July 1, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 1
body: When that attraction to Krsna is awakened within the heart, we have to follow our heart and when we follow our heart we will see how great and valuable this gift is. Appreciation for what we received becomes so much greater when we see its value. July 1, 2005, Lipetsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 2
body:
As soon as one man sees the breast and this armpit of a young woman, then he is finished. And so long he will be charmed with these things, he has to take birth again and again.

Washington D. C., July 2, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 2
body: What does it mean to have faith in the Holy Name? One actually has to have faith that by chanting the Holy Name of the Lord one can achieve the ultimate goal of life, that he can achieve ecstatic love to the Supreme Lord. July 2, 2001, Tallin
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 3
body:
Anyone who carries Krishna within himself, constantly, can go anywhere and turn the place into a sacred pilgrimage.

Letter to Rupanuga, July 3, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 3
body: The best way to speak the truth without distorter and deviation is by only speaking topics related to Krsna. This is how a devotee is always truthful. July 3, 1996, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 4
body:
So far as learning the film industry, that is out of the question. Krishna industry is good engagement for us.

Letter to Nayabhirame, July 4, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 4
body: As Supersoul in the hearts of all living entities, He is equal to everyone. But for the Supreme Lord, who is the origin of the Supersoul, He naturally reciprocates with the attitude of the person who approaches Him. July 4, 2003, Kishiniov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 4
body:
So far as learning the film industry, that is out of the question. Krishna industry is good engagement for us.

Letter to Nayabhirame, July 4, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 5
body:
Originally Krishna’s energy is one; spiritual energy. But according to different functions, Maya is represented differently. In the material world the energy is called Bhadra, and in the spiritual world the same Maya is called Subhadra. Su means auspicious. So in the spiritual world, the same Maya works auspiciously, and in the material world the same Maya works inauspiciously.

Letter to Upendra, July 5, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 5
body:
Krsna is equal to everyone, and according to one's ability to receive the favor of Krsna, one advances in Krsna consciousness.

July 6, 2005, Sukharevo
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 6
body:
When initiation is given, the Spiritual Master becomes the spiritual father and the gayatri mantra becomes the spiritual mother and thus second birth takes place.

Letter to Hridayananda, July 6, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 7
body:
Think of Krishna always and try to work sincerely, and everything will come automatically.

Letter to Aniruruddha, July 7, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 7
body:
In other words, when a person sees everything connected to Krsna, he can’t say anything which is not true, because Krsna dictates from within his heart. He has realized the conclusions of all scriptures.

July 7, 1998, Sukharevo
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 8
body:
I am your Spiritual Father, and Krishna is your Spiritual Husband. A girl can never forget either her father or her husband.

Letter to Jadurdani, July 8, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 8
body:
When Krsna refers to the regulative principles of devotional service, He is talking about regulative principles of hearing and chanting, that one has to regulate his life in hearing and chanting the glories of the Lord in the association of devotees and one has to regulate his life also in worshiping the deities, that’s performing those activities which are connected to the Lord. So by strictly following those regulative principles and hearing regularly the pastimes of the Lord, then one becomes qualified for the spontaneous devotional service.

July 8, 2000, Riga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 9
body:
To train a new man is like training a wild animal to be a pet. Just like the tiger is trained in the circus and later on they are dancing to the tune of the master. So the point being stressed is training. A preacher should always be tolerant.

Letter to Gaura Hari, July 9, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 8
body:
What constitutes something of great value? What makes it valuable? Everybody calculates that which is valuable in terms of it's material opulence. But we should understand, that this quality of being valuable can exist only in relationship to Krsna.

July 9, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 10
body:
Although the Goddess of Fortune is very restless and does not like to stay in one place for very long time, she is always finding new wonderful things in serving Krishna’s Lotus Feet so that she never thinks of leaving Him. This is actually the position of Krishna Consciousness, that when we get some taste of rendering sublime loving service to the Lord, no more do we have any taste for any other engagements.

Letter to Lakshmi, July 10, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 10
body:
Somebody gives you something very valuable, then you put it in the prominent place and you use it. If you use it all the time, then you will be able to appreciate its value. If you never use it, then how is it valuable? ... So if somebody gives you an instruction what helps you to remember Krsna, lock it in your heart. Then you will get spiritual strength.

July 10, 2005, St. Petersburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 11
body:
You have asked if it is true that the Spiritual Master remains in the material universe until all of His disciples are transferred to the Spiritual Sky. The answer is yes, this is the rule. Therefore, every student should be very much careful not to commit any offense that will be detrimental to this promotion to the Spiritual Kingdom, and thereby the Spiritual Master has to incarnate again to deliver him. This sort of mentality will be a kind of offense to the Spiritual Master. Anyone who defies and therefore disconnects the relationship with the Spiritual Master can hardly expect the assistance of the Spiritual Master life after life.

Letter to Jayapataka, July 11, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 11
body:
One must have spiritual strength. If there is no spiritual strength, then the Lord will not manifest to such a person, neither before him nor in his mind, nor in his heart.

July 11, 2005, Ekaterinburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 12
body:
If by the tongue you chant Hare Krishna mantra, and by the tongue you taste prasadam, you will be perfect, simply by executing these two things.

London, July 12, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 12
body:
As long as one continues to have that desire, even there may still be many other desires within the heart, but if he goes on fanning that spiritual desire, gradually all the other material desires will be burned up. Just by that desire to achieve Krsna.

July 12, 2005, Ekaterinburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 13
body:
By chance if one forgets Krishna, Krishna does not forget him.

Philadelphia, July 13, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 13
body:
So if I really want to serve the Lord, than first and foremost I should chant the Holy Name of the Lord without offense.

July 13, 2005, Ekaterinburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 14
body:
Devotional service is a completely spiritual process. He has nothing what so ever to do with this material world.

July 15, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 14
body:
If one is a poor man, he can go to some friend’s house and accept food and then come back, but one should never accept residence in other’s house.

Letter to Hayagriva, July 14, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 15
body:
Valuable nuts like almonds, macadamias, walnuts, coconuts, etc. take a long time to fructify. Anything valuable takes a little time to come into existence. Therefore there is no harm in waiting for the best thing.

Letter to Shyamasundara, July 15, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 15
body:
The materialists think: “We are escaping reality”, but a devotee, who actually practices Krsna consciousness, perceives the reality.

July 15, 2002, Tallin
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 16
body:
If the husband is first class and the wife is chaste and faithful, then the home is heaven.

San Francisco, July 16, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 16
body:
If we want actually to become joyful, happy and peaceful, and all our desires completely fulfilled, then, the method of satisfying the Lord in this age - is to take up this congregational chanting and glorification of the Lord.

July 16, 2000, Kaunas
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 17
body:
You are all my limbs of my body. Unless you cooperate, my life will be useless.

Letter to Brahmananda, July 17, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 17
body:
Kirtan is the means for conquering the mind. To engage in smaranam one has to be very very advanced. Only very few can engage in smaranam, but kirtan is accessible and available to anyone.

July 17, 2002, Tallin
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 17
body:
Kirtan is the means for conquering the mind. To engage in smaranam one has to be very very advanced. Only very few can engage in smaranam, but kirtan is accessible and available to anyone.

July 17, 2002, Tallin
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 18
body:
I know that if you maintain the association of devotees your life will be happy and perfect. That is the version of the sastra that the most important thing of spiritual realization is the company of realized souls or pure devotees of the Lord.

Letter to Tribhuvanatha, July 18, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 18
body:
In the material world everybody places value on those things which are pleasing to themselves and therefore they become bound in the network of reactions of forgetfulness of God.

July 18, 2003, Kaunas
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 19
body:
Crying is a great transcendental pleasure. That they cannot understand, the poor fund of knowledge. Chaitanya Mahaprabhu was simply crying. That is love. So that they do not understand, how crying can be pleasure. That is Mayavada.

Vrindavana, July 19, 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 19
body:
That, which always exists, that is reality. But that, which is temporary, is the illusory energy of the Lord.

July 19, 1997, Lipetsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 20
body:
Our Krishna consciousness movement is how to become one of the gopi-jana. Then Krishna will save us from any danger, even by lifting a hill or mountain.

New York, July 20, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 20
body:
Why devotee is the most powerful yogi? Because of love which devotee has for Krsna, he brings the most powerful Being in creation under his control.

July 20, 1997, Voronezh
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 21
body:
When the husband is executing his activities very nicely it is credit not only to the husband himself, but it is a credit to his wife also.

Letter to Balai, July 21, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 21
body:
We may not fully understand what is the ultimate plan, what is my role in this plan, what am I suppose to accomplish in this life. First he should become obedient to Krsna, and then everything else will become reveled to him.

July 21, 2001, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 22
body:
Rich man’s son, he hasn’t got to do anything, so his brain is devil’s workshop.

London, July 22, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 22
body:
Devotees, who have love for God, sometimes experience feelings of separation from God, but these feelings of separation simply increase the devotees' attachment to the object of their love more and more.

July 22, 2002, Riga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 23
body:
If you send the typewriter to heaven, it is to be worked as typewriter. Either in this hell or heaven, typewriter will kat, kat, kat, kat. Similarly our position is servant. If you don’t become servant of Krishna, then you become servant of your wife, your children, your relative, your country, your nation, your dog.

London, July 23, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 23
body:
By popular vote anybody can become so-called spiritual master. But the spiritual master must be recognized by his qualities, and ultimately he must be recognized by his spiritual master and Krsna.

July 26, 1993, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 24
body:
You cannot stop war and go on killing animals. There will be so many accidents for killing. When Krishna kills, He kills wholesale. When I kill—one after another. But when Krishna kills, they assemble all the killers and kill.

New York, July 24, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 24
body:
When the devotee thinks: “Will Krsna be happy? Will Krsna be happy by this activity?” When he thinks in this way, he thinks first of Krsna's happiness. That’s how he transcends duality.

July 24, 2000, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 25
body:
The spiritual science becomes revealed to the devotee from within the heart according to the degree of his surrender to Krsna.

Letter to Ekayani, July 25, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 25
body:
The spiritual master knows how to distribute the medicine. Just as the physician has to know also how to prescribe medicine. If he gives too heavier dose to the patient who is suffering too intensely, the dose could kill the patient, or if he doesn’t give enough – patient will never be can cured.

July 25, 1997, Kharkov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 26
body:
Tulasi is a worshipable plant so there is no question of using any sprays. The best thing is to simply daily water tulasi devi and keep her clean. Nothing else is required.

Letter to Vrinda devi, July 26, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 26
body:
One who doesn’t endeavor, then he becomes under the influence of Maya, but one who endeavors for the satisfaction of Krsna - this is Krsna consciousness.

July 26, 1993, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 27
body:
A leader must be peaceful, self-controlled, austere, pure, tolerant, honest, wise, learned and religious.

Letter to Karandhara, July 27, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 27
body:
So license is meant to regulate, and also meant to restrict. Similarly, wherever there is license for sense gratification or wherever there is regulated activities in the scriptures, they actually meant to restrict sense gratification.

July, 27 2004, Lithuania festival
author: Niranjana Swami

title: July 28
body:
Every individual being must have his opinion, that is the significance of individuality, but all such differences of opinions must coincide in Krishna.

Letter to Mandali Bhadra, July 28, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 28
body:
The police department may be horrible for the criminals, but to the government it is a department as good as university department. Similarly, mahamaya is horrible to the conditioned soul, but to the liberated soul, there is no fear of mahamaya, because he is protected by yogamaya.

Letter to Madhusudana, July 29, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 30
body:
Child worship is more important than deity-worship. If you cannot spend time with your child, then stop the duties of pujari. These children are given to us by Krishna. They are Vaisnavas and we must be very careful to protect them. These are not ordinary children, they are Vaikuntha children, and we are very fortunate we can give them chance to advance further in Krishna Consciousness. That is very great responsibility, do not neglect it or be confused.

Letter to Arundhati, July 30,1972.
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: July 31
body:
There is a book called Aquarian Gospel in which it is stated that Lord Jesus Christ lived in the temple of Jagannatha. Without being His devotee, how could he live there and how the authorities could allow a non-devotee to live there? From that book it appears that Lord Jesus Christ lived in intimate relations with the priest order.

Letter to Hayagriva, July 31, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 1
body:
Sometimes by association of the great, one appears great. In the sun is great heat and light, and by reflecting the greatness of the sun's light, the moon in dead of night also appears great. Actually the moon is by nature dark and cold but in association with sun it has become accepted as great.

Letter to Jahnava, August 1, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 2
body:
A fish, when it is put into the land, it is unhappy, or death. Similarly, if you, the creature of the land, if you are put into the water, you are unhappy, and death. So because we belong to the spiritual nature, so long we shall remain in the material nature, we must be unhappy.

Vrindavan, August 2, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 3
body:
Anything fresh, that is full of vitamin. Grow fresh, take fresh.

Paris, August 3, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 4
body:
Vaisnavas do not require to practice any yogic power to become materially powerful. Simply his surrender to Krisna makes him all-powerful. This is the position of Vaisnava.

Vrndavana, August 4, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 5
body:
Habit is the second nature. So practice.

Detroit, August 5, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 5
body:
Every learned person knows, that attachment to the material is the cause of bondage for the living entities. When the same attachment applied to the self-realized devotees, it opens the door to liberation.

August 5, 1992, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 6
body:
Our Society is like one big family and our relationships should be based on love and trust. We must give up the fighting spirit and use our intelligence to push ahead.

Letter to Upendra, August 6, 1970 Август, 6
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 6
body:
Accepting the spiritual master means to receive instructions about how to execute one's duties in Krsna consciousness. When one's faith will become stronger, one will advance. There must be activity, not blind faith.

August 6, 1998, Smolensk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 8
body:
The pickpocket takes from your pocket and he becomes a criminal, and when the wife takes thousand dollars from your pocket, you do not consider her to be criminal. You laugh, "Oh, you have taken the money?" "Yes, I've taken." The business is a pickpocket. Actually thieves and rogues, but we have named them "relatives."

Tehran, August 8, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 8
body:
Srimad Bhagavatam is meant for those, who are free from envy. One must give up his envious nature of the Lord. One of the greatest symptoms of envy is to try to put oneself on the same level with the Lord.

August 8, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 9
body:
Pure devotee [...] knows, that Krsna is present in the instructions of the spiritual master. He knows, that hearing the instructions of the spiritual master is as good, as seeing the Supreme Personality of Godhead, because the Lord appears before the disciple in the instructions of the spiritual master.

August 9, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 9
body:
Krsna takes special appreciation for His devotees who are engaged in risking for His preaching work, and He will give you special care and guidance at all times because you are sincerely trying to serve Him in this way.

Letter to Amogha, August 9, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 10
body:
You expand the empire of Krishna consciousness. Krishna has given you the ability. Do it enthusiastically with the courage of an Englishman and the heart of a Bengali mother.

Vrindavan, August 10, 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 10
body:
The firm faith in the Holy Name of the Lord should present before taking initiation. Candidate must experience the glories of the Holy Name of the Lord before accepting the Holy Name of the Lord.

August 10, 2002, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 11
body:
When one actually has complete shelter in the Lord and has affectionate relationship to the Lord, it also includes the Lords parts and parcels. So it’s never selfish to be fully dependent upon the Lord and to be fully conscious of the Lord.

August 11, 2005, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 11
body:
We should take any lila of Krishan as Supreme. The Vrindavan lila, Krishna's lila with the gopis, is the most confidential lila. We should not entertain this confidential lila unless we are liberated. It is very difficult subject. And because they cannot understand what is Krishna's lila, they imitate, they fall down.

Vrindavan, August 11, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 12
body:
Kirtana means both lecturing and chanting with music. The chanting with music is especially attractive for the mass of people, but taking from philosophical point of view on Krishna Consciousness is also chanting.

Letter to Upendra, August 12, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 12
body:
Anything that increases Krsna's pleasure is always spiritual, and therefore even the competition in the spiritual world is completely spiritual because it is also increases Krsna's pleasure.

August 12, 2005, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 13
body:
Yes. As soon as you become strong, naturally there will be more enemies. That is natural.

Vrndavana, August 13, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 13
body:
You have to start seeing Krsna with the ears. When you see Krsna through the ears, then you will engage the other senses in the service of Krsna with faith and that purify senses. Krsna will reveal Himself to you.

August 13, 2005, Vitebsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 14
body:
Husband and wife dying together, it is because asakti (attachment) is there. That asakti will help him, that the wife will become a husband next life, and the husband will become wife next. And in that way they'll have to take birth again.

August 14, 1976, Bombay
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 14
body:
To the degree that we chant with feeling, we are associating and to the degree that we don’t chant with feeling, we are not associating. To the degree that we hear others with feeling, we are associating and to the degree that we lack interest of hearing, we are not associating. That is what it means to associate. It’s with feeling.

August 14, 2008, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 15
body:
Whether you are lusty or a thief or a murderer or whatever it may be ? somehow or other you must develop this eagerness, this desire: "I must see Krishna." Then Krishna will be seen.

Los Angeles, August 15, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 16
body:
Regarding the art of management, constant changing is not good. Even if there is some fault in management it should be corrected, not changed. Besides that, Vaisnava philosophy is that everyone is addressed as prabhu, or master. Everyone should consider himself the servant of the other. That will make management very nice.

Letter to Batu Gopal, August 16,1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 16
body:
We should have that faith, that by satisfying the spiritual master we can satisfy Krsna. That faith must be there.

August 16, 1992, Dnepropetrovsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 17
body:
Failure is the pillar of success. Then try. Again you shall try.

Vrindavan, August 17, 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 17
body:
Unless one is submissive, very anxious to hear or willing to give up his false pride and prestige and prostrate himself before the bona fide spiritual master, then the seed of transcendental knowledge can never take root, grow properly or flourish and blossom to fruits of love of Godhead.

August 17, 1992, Dnepropetrovsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 18
body:
Vedic civilization is, even one is enemy, if he comes to your home, you receive him as, so friendly that he will forget that you are his enemy.

London, August 18,1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 18
body:
For one who is always dependent upon the Lord, then there is never any cause of fear, because fear only comes from seeing things separate from Krsna.

August 18, 1992, Kharkov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 19
body:
Real contraceptive method is that if you are unable to deliver your son from the clutches of birth and death, do not become a father.

Hyderabad, August 19, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 19
body:
A devotee can understand that he can do anything if he depends on Krsna for the result, because it’s not that he is doing it, but that Krsna is using him as instrument.

August 19, 1989, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 20
body:
Maya is on the back side of Krsna and if we keep ourselves always in front side of Krsna, engaged in His service, then the external energy on the back side of Krsna will not be able to attack us.

Letter to Bhagavan, August 20,1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 20
body:
So that which is inconceivable can be understood if one accepts that the Lord has inconceivable energies, because by the inconceivable energies of the Supreme Lord, that which is inconceivable can be conceived. But without surrendering to the Lord, they will always remain inconceivable.

August 20, 2008, Budapest
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 21
body:
Krishna is everywhere. Simply you have to catch Him. And he's also ready for being caught. Yes, if somebody wants to catch Him. Suppose you are a devotee. If you want to catch Him, He comes forward ten times than your desire. He's so kind. Therefore, we have to simply receive Him.

London, August 21, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 21
body:
What does it mean to be carefully chanting the Holy Name of the Lord? It means to understand the glories of the Holy Name of the Lord.

August 21, 2001, Odessa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 22
body:
Energy is always kept on the left side. Radharani is on the left side of the Lord, and similarly, Laksmiji is also on the left side of the Lord. We are also marginal energy, not exactly like Radharani or Laksmiji, so we should keep ourself always on the left side of the Lord, and let us act as His Arms, or army.

Letter to Brahmananda, August 22, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 22
body:
So the substance should be there first and then the form will follow. And the substance is simply wanting to see others advancing in Krsna consciousness, assisting the spiritual master in taking care of devotees and in helping devotees increase their faith in the process of Krsna consciousness and in the Holy Names of the Lord.

August 22, 2008, New Vraja Dhama
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 23
body:
We should not eat more than required. Eating, sleeping, mating, all these are material demands; the more we minimize, then that is good, but not at the risk of health. Because we have to work for Krishna, so we must maintain our health nicely.

Montreal, August 23, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 23
body:
Discipline means that we do something that we may not necessarily want to do and when we accept that force and see it’s connection to Krsna, then we become Krsna conscious and in doing so we become inspired, knowing where it is coming from.

August 23, 2001, Odessa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 24
body:
Emperor Akbar, his chief minister was Todarmal. Todarmal is Hindu. The Muslim emperors used to employ Hindus as chief of department. They did not believe Muslims to become the chief. They knew it very well that these Muslims are not reliable. They can kill their father even.

New Delhi, August 24, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 24
body:
So we must always keep Krsna consciousness present and face the light and not turn our backs on Krsna. As long as we are always moving forward to Krsna and He sees that our desire is to go forward, then He pulls. That is Krsna. He is all attractive. That means He’s also pulling.

August 24, 1992, Donetsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 25
body:
Chanakya Pandit says that if there is one tree in the forest producing nice aromatic flower, that one tree can glorify the whole forest by the flavour of its flower. Similarly, if there is one tree in whose cavity there is a little fire, that one tree can burn into ashes the whole forest. So this simile is applicable anywhere. In a family if these is one good boy, he can glorify the whole family and similarly if there is bad boy he can turn the whole family into ashes.

Tokyo, August 25, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 25
body:
A devotee is one who is always anxiously hankering to associate with the Lord. That is the symptom of the advanced devotee.

August 25, 1997, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 26
body:
"Big, big monkey, big, big belly ? Ceylon jumping, melancholy." With big belly a monkey comes forward, and if you ask him, "Jump over like Hanumanji," finished, belly finished. "I cannot do it." And why you have got so much belly? So this is not good.

Vrindavan, August 26, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 26
body:
We are all looking to be self satisfied, but we are so much dependent, that under illusion we think that the best way to be self satisfied is by attaching ourselves to material objects.

August 26, 2001, Simferopol
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 27
body:
A little bit of pure thing is much better than huge volumes of impure, adulterated things.

Letter to Brahmananda, August 27, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 27
body:
Why does Krsna come? He comes for our benefit, for the conditioned souls who have forgotten Him. There is nothing for Him to gain by appearing in this world. He is not coming to collect some personal servants, but comes to display these pastimes, entrap the living entity back to His eternal realm of enjoyment or pleasure.

August 27, 2005, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 28
body:
Always think of the Lotus Feet of Sri Krishna and you will find no difficulties in executing the tasks allotted to you by Krishna.

Letter to Satsvarupa das, August 28, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 28
body:
So this svarupa shakti, the Lords internal potency, is coming from the Lord and manifests in the Holy Name and in the hearts of Vaishnava’s. Therefore, if we can serve Vaishnava’s we can actually become proper recipients for this svarupa shakti to enter into our hearts. Then we get nourishment, strength, knowledge and experience some bliss. This is the most blissful engagement and there is nothing more satisfying to the self then to serve the Supreme Lord and to serve the Vaishnava’s.

August 28, 2003, Odessa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 29
body:
Do not be depressed. All along my godbrothers gave me only depression, repression, compression ? but I continued strong in my duty. So never mind there is some discouragement, continue with your work in full enthusiastic Krishna Consciousness attitude of service.

Letter tо Gurudas, August 29, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 29
body:
Love can only exist when Krsna is at the center and when we serve others. Therefore, we see that by serving others we are serving Krsna and when we associate with others in a loving way, its helping us to remember Krsna. That is what actually attracts one devotee with another because Krsna is at the center.

August 29, 2005, Moscow 10:21
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 31
body:
Best thing is if you chant Hare Krishna and go to Krishna Loka and find out the answers to all these questions yourself.

Letter to Ekayani, August 31, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: August 30
body:
How do we develop love for Krsna if we don’t know anything about Him? When you hear how wonderful He is and the more you hear that, then just seeing Him invokes such love within the heart, because you have heard first. That is the power of hearing.

August 30, 2005, Mogiliov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: August 31
body:
Krsna knows best how to bring everyone back to Godhead. He knows just how to help surrendered souls and what situation to put them in so that they can make advancement. Why? Because He knows our desires.

August 31, 1991, Riga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 1
body:
A devotee knows how to engage himself and others in the service of Krsna completely, as well as all the wealth of the world in the matter of propagating Krsna consciousness. Rest assured.

Letter to Gurukra das, September 1, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 1
body:
One should always recite the ten offenses to the Holy Names of the Lord and always be very careful to avoid them and continue chanting the Holy Names with firm faith and confidence that one can be delivered by this process.

September 1, 1991, Riga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 2
body:
Spiritual master's qualification is he's trying his best to deliver the soul from these clutches of maya. That is a great service. Therefore he is very dear. One who is chanting or executing devotional service for his personal benefit and one who is trying to deliver others for others' benefit, there is difference.

Delhi, September 2, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 2
body:
One receives duties from the spiritual master, scriptures and Vaishnava’s, which are from a higher plain of existence, beyond the mind which has the tendency to accept and reject on the basis of sense gratification. As long as we accept on the basis of sense gratification, how can we know that it is our duty. It is not possible. Therefore we have to get our duty from a higher state of existence, beyond the mind.

September 2, 2001, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 3
body:
Without the mercy of Balarama, nobody can appreciate Vrndavana life.

Vrindavan, September 3, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 3
body:
Pleasure, pain, happiness and distress, honor or dishonor, they are all the same for the devotee, because a devotee is always dependent upon the good will of the Lord.

September 3, 1993, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 4
body:
A madman, what does he not say, and a goat, what does he not eat?

Vrindavan, September 4, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 4
body:
It is only Krsna who can actually purify the heart from all reactions of sinful life. Therefore a Vaishnava, who gives Krsna, can also give one a means by which his heart can become pure because he is giving Krsna by his association and it is Krsna who is taking away all the reactions. That’s the only way how one can become clear from the reactions of a sinful life.

September 4, 1993, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 5
body:
"A brahmana, even if he gets one lakh of rupees, one hundred thousands of rupees, still he is a beggar." Because he will not keep it. He will immediately distribute it in charity.

London, September 5, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 5
body:
The whole advancement along the path of devotional service is an evolution of faith. So if you don’t have faith in the statements of scriptures, in the words of the spiritual master, in acintya sakti, then you haven’t really understood it. Better forget it. That’s what Prabhupada said, forget about it, you are never going to get there.

September 5, 2009, New Vraja Dhama
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 6
body:
Even if there are some dead metal utensils, but when they are together they make so much noise, so what to speak of living utensils. This is natural, but since we are all pledged to work for Krsna we should follow the principle of Lord Chaitanya Mahaprabhu: trnad api request is do not be agitated. Let us do our duty honestly.

Vrindavan, September 6, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 6
body:
For those who are fortunate enough to actually hear the teachings of Srila Prabhupada, whether from his books or followers, they can be one of those fortunate souls who Srila Prabhupada descended to this world to reclaim and only require the willingness to hear the truth.

September 6, 1996, Palanga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 7
body:
It is not true that there are no shoes in Krsna lila, rather there are shoes except for the Vrndavana pastimes. But the shoes are of another quality, they are beautiful with jewels, etc. On the battlefield they must wear shoes.

Letter to Radhavallabha Das, September 7, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 7
body:
We should at least know what we should be looking for in shelter so we won’t be cheated and take shelter in the wrong thing and by doing so know what to look for. Then that’s the right start and we can pray for it.

September 7, 2005, Odessa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 7
body:
Even you are a drunkard, you are fond of tasting wine, I should recommend that you simply think that “This taste of wine is Krishna.” That will make a yogi of you. That will make you the greatest yogi. If you simply think this, that “I am tasting wine. Oh very nice taste. This is Krishna.”

Stockholm, September 8, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 8
body:
Srila Prabhupada says that every living entity has a relationship with Krsna. But when one becomes a devotee, the relationship becomes intimate and then lila is there because the lila is the Lords dealings with His devotees.

September 8, 2005, Odessa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 9
body:
You mentioned that your pathway has become filled with stumbling blocks, but there are no stumbling blocks. I can kick out all those stumbling blocks immediately, provided you accept my guidance. With one stroke of my kick I can kick out all stumbling blocks.

Letter to Krsna Das, September 9, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 9
body:
How do we serve such devotees? By hearing very enthusiastically. Because if they speak, they wants us to hear and the more people who hear enthusiastically, the more inspired they becomes to speak. Real service is giving by donating the ears.

September 9, 2004, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 10
body:
It does not matter whether there is increase of population. But if the people are unfaithful, they must be punished with starvation. That is God's will.

Stockholm, September 10, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 10
body:
As one looks at opulent food and thinks, “yes, let me enjoy”, so one can similarly look at Krsna with that same spirit of enjoyment, “oh, God, He is my order supplier and can give me happiness”. So it’s the same type of connection with it being temporary and not lasting. One can make a more permanent and solid connection with Krsna when one actually has unalloyed love for Krsna.

September 10, 1995, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 11
body:
One who is making false statement, he'll suffer for that.

San Francisco, September 11, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 11
body:
Srila Prabhupada would always emphasize that this book distribution was the brihad mrdanga and that kirtan can be heard within the limited range, but through book distribution kirtan can be heard throughout the whole world.

September 11, 2002, Odessa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 12
body:
A musician, because one has got a good attachment for music, he tries to perform it very perfectly. So love is the basis. Similarly, when you serve Krishna, if you have no love for Krishna, you cannot serve Him very nicely. And Krishna also does not accept your service if it is not done in great love and affection.

London, September 12, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 12
body:
The more you associate with devotees who really inspire you, the more you begin to appreciate qualities even in devotees who appear not to be inspirational.

September 12, 2003, Kazakhstan festival
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 13
body:
As soon as you become God conscious, the demons will create disturbance. Just like Lord Jesus Christ. He was crucified by the demons. The only fault was that he was God.

Los Angeles, September 13, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 13
body:
So when everything is upfront and we have no hidden motives for sense gratification, then this actually creates trust and it is a very very important part of this system to be able to trust devotees in this way by increasing straightforward dealings.

September 13, 1998, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 14
body:
We have to work sincerely, and because Krishna is in everyone's heart, there will he no difficulty to have the necessary facilities.

Letter to Satsvarupa, September 14, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 14
body:
The devotee should not be artificial in his behavior by trying to be something that he or she is not. If we simply endeavor to please Krsna, then that in itself is very attractive and also very purifying.

September 14, 1997, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 15
body:
Do your best to serve Krishna and he will give you required intelligence to cope with disturbing situations.

Letter to Jayagovinda, September 15, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 15
body:
But that is the danger of the material world that just a little inattentiveness can cause one to fall away and to deviate from the path of devotional service.

September 15, 1992, Riga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 16
body:
The holy name, chanting of holy name, if we act it properly, without any offense, then we are directly in connection with Krishna.

Vrndavana, September 16, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 16
body:
A Vaishnava is always giving the most valuable thing, the holy names of the Lord and instructions in relationship to it and when we will know such value, then we will know the value of the Vaishnava’s who are giving these things to us. It will make us become very much attached to them, want to hear from them and take everything of value which they wish to offer to us. That is what it means to become attached

September 16, 2004, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 17
body:
Now there are third-class, fourth-class men, dressed like President and king, but their business is to plunder money from the citizens and kill cow. This is Kali-yuga's king. Dressed like king, but sudra. Very expert in cow-killing.

On 17 September, 1965
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 17
body:
To the degree that we see things in connection with Krsna, remember Krsna, speak about Krsna and hear about Krsna in the association of Vaishnava’s, to that degree attachment and fever of illusion will gradually decrease and we will come down and become healthy. So we have to learn how to see things properly according to the vision of liberated souls.

September 17, 2008, Ukraine festival
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 18
body:
I feel happy that even after my departure, things will go on. I am happy that I have got so many sincere devotees who will carry on. That is my happiness.

Letter to Madhudvisa, September 18, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 18
body:
A devotee has to feel helpless, but never hopeless.

September 18, 2008, Ukraine festival
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 19
body:
Ksura means sharpened razor. If you are careful, you cleanse very nicely. If you are not careful, immediately blood. So the spiritual life is like that. As soon as you become little inattentive, immediately maya captures, "Yes, come on." Then everything failure.

Bombay, September 19, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 19
body:
One who became a brahmacari because householder life is too troublesome is not a brahmacari. Yet one who became a brachmacari because he likes to study sastra, to chant and hear in the association of devotees, to preach Krsna consciousness, to rise early in the morning and to engage in sadhana in the association of devotees, this is brahmacari life. One who likes to live simply and doesn’t like to accumulate things.

September 19, 2004, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 20
body:
Any devotee who has developed genuine love for Krishna can also explain the truth about Krishna because Krishna helps such sincere devotee seated in his heart.

Delhi, September 20, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 20
body:
The necessity of life is not simply to maintain life in the body but to take to the higher understanding that the necessity of life is service to the Supreme.

September 20, 2009, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 21
body:
If we say that our Spiritual Master is Krishna, then the conclusion is that if we become Spiritual Master some day, then we will also become Krishna. Please try to understand how dangerous this kind of reasoning is.

Calcutta, September 21, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 21
body:
A devotee always thinks that he is an instrument and that he is subordinate to the superior order and the potency to execute that superior order is already impregnated in the words of that order. If any good qualities manifests or any abilities to induce others to develop good qualities and become Krsna conscious manifests, it is only because the devotee is following the instructions.

September 21, 2009, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 22
body:
The more people will be materialistic, the world will be burdened. Therefore there must be war, pestilence, famine, to clear these rascals, clear out.

Vrindavan, September 22, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 22
body:
If the question is asked, “can I actually achieve pure devotional service in this life?”, then one should understand the principles of faith and how to protect and nourish them and if one continues to cultivate this one genuine desire and not the other desires, then the answer to this question is “Yes”.

September 22, 2004, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 23
body:
Radharani is the source of spiritual inspiration.

Calcutta, September 23, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 23
body:
Best charity is to give message of Godhead for the wealth of the human society.

September 23, 1997, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 24
body:
The animal propensity is to exploit others. And human propensity should be to do good to others. That is the difference between animal propensity and human propensity.

Seattle, September 24, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 24
body:
Everything what we do, we should do as an offering to Krsna and remember Krsna constantly. Therefore, by that constant endeavor to remember the Lord in the execution of all our activities, we will attain that ultimate goal – going back home, back to Godhead.

September 24, 1992, Rostov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 25
body:
Dress has to be accepted according to the taste of others and foodstuffs are to be accepted according to the other’s taste.

Letter to Raktak, September 25, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 25
body:
Sacrifice means, that you give something, you make an offering, you give something to somebody else - without any expectation in return. That is the supreme sacrifice – to give to the Lord without any expectation in return.

September 25, 1997, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 26
body:
Krsna takes special care of the devotee, guides him, gives him intelligence. What kind of intelligence? Just to give him the clue how one can go back to home, hack to Godhead. Krishna does not give intelligence how one can gain some material prosperity. Therefore people are not very much interested in worshiping Krishna.

Bombay, September 26, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 26
body:
There is no better way to be personal with someone, then to give them Krsna. This is the most personal philosophy.

September 26, 1992, Rostov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 27
body:
Guru and Krishna are two parallel lines on which the spiritual express runs very smoothly.

Letter to Devananda, September 27, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 27
body:
If we want Krsna's personal reciprocation, then there is only one way to get it - an ingredient of love must be present in the offering. Otherwise we can’t get it.

September 27, 1995, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 28
body:
Shortcut of "Demon-crazy" is "democracy." All the demons and rogues, they gather together, somehow or other votes, and occupy the seat, and the business is plundering.

Mayapur, September 28, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 28
body:
We are not just simply some armchair philosophers, who sit and simply discuss philosophy. The best way to express what we have learned in philosophy of Krsna consciousness - is to come together and chant Hare Krsna.

September 28, 2004, Novorossiysk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 29
body:
If your consciousness is absorbed in Krishna you are always a sannyasi.

Letter to Jayananda. September 29, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 29
body:
Myself I can not do it, but I have faith that Krsna will bring me to that higher platform. That kind of faith is actually required to make sacrifices.

September 29, 2005, Dnepropetrovsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: September 30
body:
The real preaching is selling books. You should know the tactic how to sell without irritating. What your lecture will do for three minutes, but if he reads one page his life may be turned.

Letter to Bali-mardan, September 30, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: September 30
body:
If we associate with persons, whose devotional service is influenced by karma or jnana, and especially, if they present it as pure devotional service, then this contamination can also affect our hearts, and because of this anarthas will grow in our own hearts.

September 30, 2004, Divnomorsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 3
body:
For me, either live or die, I don't mind. But if you are trying for my life, try it very seriously. That is my formula. No negligence.

Vrindavan, October 3, 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 3
body:
There is no stagnation in the spiritual platform. Spiritual platform is ever increasingly dynamic. And why is that? Because the Lord reciprocates to us.

October 3, 1999, Divnomorsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 4
body:
Krishna is not poor. Krishna has not come here. He is very hungry, He has come here to eat your puri and rasagulla. No. But Krishna is so kind that He has come before you to accept whatever you can offer with devotion.

Bombay, October 4, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 4
body:
When Srila Prabhupada said that one must strive to achieve Krsna by the right means, he meant that one must have spiritual strength, one should be very sober and careful and one should perform appropriate austerities.

October 4, 2004, Divnomorsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 5
body:
If one is situated in real Krishna consciousness, he can face the most severe type of adversity and remain completely undisturbed.

Calcutta, October 5, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 5
body:
Srila Prabhupada often spoke about the bodily conception of life as being a diseased condition of life as one didn’t actually understand what was really a healthy state of life. One who was fully self-realized and constantly conscious of one’s own spiritual identity as servant of God was somebody who was fully healthy.

October 5, 1995, St.Petersburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 6
body:
"Home, sweet home." Yes, very sweet. The whole day and night, work. This is moha. He is working hard day and night. There is not a single moment leisure, and still, he's: "Sweet home." This is illusion.

Mayapur, October 6, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 6
body:
So if one actually wants to know what is there within the heart of the devotees, one actually has to serve those devotees.

October 6, 2002, Divnomorsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 7
body:
If there is some earthquake or there is some danger, naturally, spontaneously, we pray. But we forget it. The tendency of offering prayer to the Lord at the time of danger is automatic. So we should know that we are in danger. We are in this material condition of life means we are in danger. Therefore we should pray.

Durban, October 7, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 7
body:
When person is self satisfied, he gives up all mental concoctions.

October 6, 1997, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 8
body:
You have got this body. You have to eat something. You have to cover yourself. So produce your own food and produce your own cloth. Don't waste time for luxury, and chant Hare Krishna.

Vrindavan, October 8, 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 9
body:
Hanuman was ordered to bring some medicine from some mountain. He was a monkey, he was animal, he did not know how to pick it up - "Take the whole mountain. Execute the order." And then Ramachandra and Laksmana, They'll find out what is that medicine." This is Vaisnava. In ones own capacity he should give the best service to the Lord.

Aligarh, October 9, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 8
body:
Real way of spreading Krsna consciousness, is be Krsna consciousness. If you want to spread it, you have to have it. Otherwise, how it can be spread?

October 8, 1997, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 9
body:
Krsna is completely self-satisfied, therefore, when Krsna comes as Sri Caitanya Mahaprabhu, He comes for the welfare of the living entities, so that they may share that bliss, so that they may actually experience the superior happiness by giving up the false happiness of this material world.

October 9, 1992, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 10
body:
Even Krishna, whom we accept as the Supreme Lord, had to go to gurukula and serve the spiritual master as a menial servant.

Durba, October 10,1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 10
body:
When a person is serious about spiritual life, he learns what is the will of the Lord, by hearing through the medium of the spiritual master.

October 10, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 11
body:
A Krishna conscious person must be seen by ears and not by the eyes. One should try to know the depth of realization by Krishna conscious person and not see the beard, which has become the practice of the Hippies.

Letter to Brahmananda, October 11,1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 11
body:
If a person has devotion within his heart, then the Lord is very eager to accept whatever the devotee offers. So devotional service is not calculated according quantity... We understand, that it is a quality of the offering, which pleases the Lord.

October 11, 2009, Budapest
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 12
body:
If you put butter before the fire, automatically it melts. Similarly, a woman is considered as fire and the man is considered as butter. So this is natural. But a person who is not agitated, he is called dhira.

Manila, October 12, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 12
body:
Unless one is fully self-satisfied, one's mind will be always hankering for something he lacks. This is the nature of being in material consciousness. It is only when one attains the shelter of the lotus feet of Sri Krishna that one is totally at peace.

October 12, 1994, Novosibirsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 12
body:
Unless one is fully self-satisfied, one's mind will be always hankering for something he lacks. This is the nature of being in material consciousness. It is only when one attains the shelter of the lotus feet of Sri Krishna that one is totally at peace.

October 12, 1994, Novosibirsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 13
body:
A pure devotee is he who loves Krishna, without any material desire. Such pure devotees are very rare. But by the Grace of Krishna, practically all the devotees and disciples who have kindly joined me, their symptoms are pure devotees. Even if they have got some ulterior desire, that will be removed very soon, because they have taken to the pure process of Krishna Consciousness.

Letter to Janaki, October 13, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 13
body:
So there is certain standard for living in Srila Prabhupada's temples. And this standard is that these temples are specifically intended for introducing people to Krsna consciousness.

October 13, 1997, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 14
body:
I have given the ideas. Now you give the shape.

Vrindavan, October 14, 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 14
body:
What does it mean for the Lord to be controlled by the devotee? It means, that the Lord is captured by the desire of the devotee and the Lord is simply anxious to satisfy that devotee’s desire.

October 14, 1993, Perm
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 15
body:
As Brahma is thinking to create a universe, you are thinking to create a skyscraper building, the ant is thinking to create a hole within the room - the quality of the work is the same. But because we are fools, that these things are material, it will not stay.

Mayapur, October 15, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 15
body:
A devotee is confident, because he always expects the mercy of the Lord. This is his confidence. But to be able to see this mercy and how it will manifest, one should be in proper consciousness.

October 15, 2001, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 16
body:
What is this comfort of the skyscraper building? I think it is a mechanical prison.

Johannesburg, October 16, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 16
body:
We should avoid association of those, who may distract our attention from Krsna.

October 16, 1992, St. Petersburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 17
body:
The six goswamis were merged in the ocean of the love affairs of the gopis with Krishna. Therefore this mendicantism (renunciation), it was external. They were enjoying better things. So unless you enjoy better thing, you cannot give up inferior thing.

Vrindavan, October 17, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 17
body:
A living entity can never become God, but due to his foolishness and due to the manifestation of this envy of the Supreme, he is thinking: "I want to enjoy just like God".

October 17, 1992, St. Petersburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 18
body:
It is not in my hands, Krishna-Balarama. I want association of Vaisnava. You are all pure Vaisnavas. You have sacrificed everything, material comforts, for Krishna's sake. That is Vaisnava.

Vrindavan, October 18, 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 18
body:
One of the symptoms of the advanced stages of bhakti is that vaisnava has hope against hope. He always has hope that he will be able to attain the service and the shelter to the lotus feet of Krsna. And therefore he is always praying in the helpless way for that association.

October 18, 2008, Ukraine festival
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 19
body:
To save a man from impersonal calamity is the greatest service to humanity.

Letter to Gargamuni, October 19, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 19
body:
So, when the Lord enjoys, what does He enjoy? He enjoys not this temporary world, but He enjoys with His eternal associates. And how does the Lord enjoy? He enjoys, because He does exactly what He wants to do.

October 19, 2008, Hartford, USA
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 20
body:
Sleeping in the spiritual world is in the state of dreaming, but that dreaming is only about Krsna. And Krsna is dealing with each of His devotees even in their dreams. Even Krsna dreams.

October 20, 2006, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 20
body:
Simply we have to desire to please Him, and not desire anything for ourselves. Then we become simply instruments for His will. This is the important essence of Krsna consciousness.

Letter to Atreya Rsi, October 20,1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 21
body:
Anything can be done by practice. So if we take Krishna-prasadam, the tongue is restricted, locked to some limited... Then our all other senses become controlled.

Vrindavan, October 21, 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 21
body:
The fruit of the endeavor of the devotee is to satisfy the Lord. This is considered to be the ultimate fruit.

October 21, 1999, St Peterburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 22
body:
Decorate the Deity as nicely as possible with nice flowers and dress. You will forget all other false beauty.

Letter to Kirtanananda, October 22, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 22
body:
There is nothing greater than Krsna, and Krsna is so kind, that He appears to us in His Name. If we can realize this, than there is nothing else to be realized.

October 22, 2006, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 23
body:
Always remember that our first business preaching and distributing literatures, never mind we have to live under a tree.

Letter to Narottamananda, October 23, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 23
body:
How we should perform our sadhana? With the desire to achieve Krsna's service. This is our sadhana.

October 23, 2001, Kishinev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 24
body:
Renunciation is required, but when one makes further progress after renunciation towards spiritual life and enters into the Pastimes of Krishna, then things become perfect.

Letter to Kapiladeva, October 24, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 24
body:
The best way to become free from suffering is to be fully engaged in devotional service to the Lord.

October 24, 2001, Kishinev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 25
body:
On the mirror if there is dust, you cannot see your face very nicely. If you wipe the mirror very nicely... So this Hare Krishna chanting is the process of wiping out the dust accumulated on the mirror of my mind.

Montreal, October 25, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 25
body:
Take shelter in your service, but not in your mind. When it starts to ramble, just chant and serve. Don't give up the struggle. As soon as you do - maya has got you.

October 25, 1986, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 26
body:
"I am the seed-giving father of all living entities." It doesn't matter in different forms. He does not say that "I am the father only of the white, not of the black."

Nairobi, October 26, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 26
body:
The living entity can never be independent. But it’s a disease symptom to think oneself to be independent. This is the whole basis of the materialistic life.

October 26, 1996, Sukharevo
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 27
body:
If anybody calls for meeting and lecturing, we must charge. And if they want to hear free, they may come to our temple. Don't become cheap. My Guru Maharaja used to say: "If somebody becomes cheap, then nobody hears him."

Montreal, October 27, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 28
body:
On our palms there are certain marks for a particular person indicating his fame and fortune. Similarly the Supreme Personality of Godhead has got certain signs on His Lotus Feet, which are unique for Him only, and they are not be found in ordinary living entities.

Letter to Bhurijana, October 28, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 28
body:
We cannot jump to the spontaneous platform of loving devotional service without being obedient first. But by being obedient to the instructions of the Supreme Lord and His devotees, gradually one can come to this spontaneous platform of devotional service, which Krsna relishes more, then simply obedience.

October 28, 2007, Budapest
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 29
body:
One who has got a helpful wife at home does not require to accept sannyas.

Letter to Krishnadevi, October 29, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 29
body:
If one simply maintains this determination: “I will never give up chanting of Hare Krsna”, then everything else comes. The Lord will always protect one, who takes shelter in Him, and the Lord makes Himself so easily available in His name.

October 29, 2006, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: October 30
body:
