People should not misunderstand that we are a band of musical artists. They must know that we are devotees of Krishna. Our devotional practice and purity shall be so strong that wherever we chant there will be immediately an impression in the audience for devotion to Krishna.

Letter to Tamal Krishna, October 30, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: October 30
body:
This is how Krsna controls everything within the entire creation. He controls everything by His sanction. Nothing can happen without His sanction.

October 30, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 1
body:
This two things side by side - Maya and Krshna - Krshna is service and Maya is sense gratification. Our duty therefore to be very careful. This poison is personal ambition.

Letter to Satyabhama, November 1, 1970.
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 1
body:
The most important instructions of the spiritual master are those instructions, which help disciple to remember Krsna.

November 1, 2001, Dnepropetrovsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 2
body:
Feeling of loneliness are simply temporary manifestations due to past conditioning. We shoud try to concentrate our attention to our enternal friendship with Krshna.

Letter to Kulasekara, November 2, 1969.
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 2
body:
The more one hankers for sense gratification, the more one becomes implicated. The more one hankers for Krsna, the more one becomes purified.

November 2, 1996, Ekaterinburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 3
body:
Sometimes a person, the proprietor of the house, after the death, remains in that house as serpent, sometimes as dog, sometimes as tree. Being too much attached to the possession, they cannot get better life. And sometimes we can get the body of a hog and monkey in Vrindavana also.

Vrindavan, November 3, 1972.
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 3
body:
The symptom of the one, who is always absorbed in devotional service, is that he attracts others to devotional service.

November 3, 1998, Novosibirsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 4
body:
Radharani and the gopis, they are all on the same status, but the gopis know that "Radharani is the better worshiper than us". Therefore their only business is how to take Radharani and join with Krishna. This is Vaikuntha understanding. They are not envious that "Krishna loves Radharani so much".

Delhi, November 4, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 4
body:
The desire to become independent in this world means to become a servant of someone else. The only real independence which the living entity has is only being fully dependent on the Lord.

November 4, 2009, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 5
body:
Your description of past incidents may be forgotten. We are not concerned with past misunderstandings, we are concerned only with progressive service to Krishna.

Letter to Govinda dasi, November 5, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 5
body:
Yes, Prabhupada was pushing [devotees], but his pushing was simply by expressing what his desire was. It doesn't seem like that was very heavy pushing. But he would just openly express what his desire was.

November 5, 2009, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 6
body:
If one renders even a small amount of sincere devotional service, Krishna becomes obliged to elevate such a person; and what to speak of one whose entire life and soul has been dedicated to Krishna's service.

Letter to Harer Nama, November 6, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 6
body:
Whatever desires are there within our heart, we find ourselves being tested according to those desires.

November 6, 1998, Vladivostok
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 5
body:
Your description of past incicents may be forgotten. We are not concerned with past misunderstandings, we are concerned only with progressive service to Krishna.

Letter to Govinda dasi, November 5, 1970

title: November 7
body:
By our endeavors alone we can never be successful in spiritual life. We must always be dependent in all circumstances.

November 7, 2001, Donetsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 8
body:
Just like a diseased person, the more he comes back to his health it becomes pleasing more and more; similarly, the more we come Krishna Consciousness, certainly it will be pleasing, because Krishna is the Reservoir of all pleasure.

Letter to Umapati, November 8, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 7
body:
The difference between a devotee and a non-devotee is this, just like the bee always attracted by the honey and flies go to the open sores. So the devotee is only attracted by the good qualities in other people and does not see their faults.

Letter to Badrinarayana, November 7, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 8
body:
These residents of Goloka Vrndavana are so elevated, that they don’t even know how great they are.

November 8, 2001, Lugansk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 9
body:
Everyone is struggling to gain something which he does not possess, and he's lamenting for something which he has lost.

Vrindavana, November 9, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 10
body:
There two ways of association - by vani and by vapuh. Vani means words, and vapuh means physical presence. Physical presence is sometimes appreciable and sometimes not, but vani continues to exist eternally.

Bombay, November 10, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 10
body:
When a mind of the devotee is peaceful, he is very strict with himself, but he is very liberal toward others.

November 10, 2001, Kharkov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 11
body:
If you simply hear about God, then you will see God by hearing. That is... Because there is cloud of dirtiness within our heart. Unless that dirtiness is cleansed, we can't perceive God. Therefore this process of chanting Hare Krishna mantra is described by Sri Caitania Mahaprabhu, ceto-darpana marjanam (Cc. Antya 20.12) "cleansing the mirror of the heart". Just like unless you cleanse the mirror which is full of dust, you can't see your face very nicely; similarly, unless you cleanse your heart very nicely, or in other words, unless your heart is cleansed of all sinful reaction, you can't understand what is God. That is not possible.

Srimad Bhagavatam 1.2.6, Delhi, November 11, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 11
body:
If a devotee is always thinking of Krsna, one becomes fearless.

November 11, 1996, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 11
body:
If a devotee is always thinking of Krsna, one becomes fearless.

November 11, 1996, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 12
body:
The principle of chanting is glorify the Lord and not to attract a crowd. If Krishna hears nicely then He will ask some sincere devotee to gather in such place.

Letter to Subala, November 12, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 12
body:
If one can chant purely, he can preach purely. Chanting purely and preaching purely is the same. When we are preaching, we want to give pure Holy Name, therefore we have to be able to chant purely and then we can preach purely.

November 12, 2001, Kharkov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 13
body:
Why do you want to go on world tour? People everywhere are doing the same thing - eating, sleeping, mating and defending - each in some slightly different way, but same substance is there. It is better if you want travel, you can travel to preach and spread this Krishna Consciousness to the suffering humanity at large.

Letter to Kris, November 13, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 14
body:
Nobody can be satisfied by thinking: "How I can simply do enough to maintain my body". It doesn’t work. It never did. It never will. It can’t satisfy the self. Only Krsna consciousness can satisfy the self.

November 14, 1998, Perm
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 15
body:
Philosophy is the highest, but even higher than philosophy is practice of philosophy. So if you simply remain pure, your preaching will have effect.

Letter to Brihaspati, November 15, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 14
body:
Chant Hare Krishna as many times as possible and be liberated. Thank you very much.

Vrindavana, November 14, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 13
body:
Therefore people need to be properly trained before entering householder life, just as a person is properly trained before driving a car.

November 13, 2009, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 15
body:
The ultimate purpose for everyone in this world is to satisfy the Supreme Lord. This is the actual message of "Bhagavad-Gita", how to serve and satisfy the Supreme Lord by one's activities.

November 15, 2009, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 16
body:
Everything belongs to Krishna. So by His favor we get opulence, riches, but when we are opulent, we forget Krishna, because maya is very strong.

Delhi, November 16, 1971.
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 17
body:
These four principles: always think about Krishna, become Krishna's devotee, worship Krishna and offer your respect obeisances to Krishna. That's all. This is Krishna Consciousness.

Hyderabad, November 17, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 17
body:
We should not think that the temple is the place designed to facilitate our desires. We are supposed to cultivate the consciousness that we are eternal servants of Krsna, not that Krsna is meant to serve us.

November 17, 1995, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 18
body:
The faith in the words of the spiritual master and in the Supreme Personality of Godhead is the secret of success.

November 18, 2001, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 18
body:
There is competition of loving Krishna even in the party of Srimati Radharani. It is a kind of rasa to compete in loving affection centering around Krishna.

Letter to Brahmananda, November 18, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 20
body:
The beauty of the outer skin can be destroyed in only a few hours merely by a dose of a strong purgative, but the beauty of truth is indestructible and always the same.

Truth and Beauty. November 20, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 20
body:
The perfect stage of independence is to serve the Supreme Being according to one's desires to serve Him.

November 20, 1998, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 21
body:
Preaching is more important than managing. Just because you are preaching nicely and distributing so much prasadam, the management will follow like a shadow and Krishna send you no end of help.

Letter to Satsvarupa, November 21, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 21
body:
This is our way of giving thanks to Krsna - to call to His Name with an intense eagerness, with an intense desire to please Him, to serve Him, to satisfy Him and to remember Him.

November 21, 1997, Boston
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 22
body:
We are neither renouncer nor enjoyer, we are simply servitor of Krishna. Please follow this principle and you will never disturbed in any frightened conditioned offered by the maya.

Letter to Gargamuni, November 22, 1968.
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 22
body:
We were all experiencing within our heart, and getting confirmation within our heart again and again and again, that by doing something to please Srila Prabhupada, we are pleasing Lord Krsna.

November 22, 2009, Budapest
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 23
body:
There is only one guru - Krsna, the Supreme Personality of Godhead. So those who simply repeat His words, they also become guru. But of course a guru never thinks himself as being God. He only thinks himself as a servant of the servant.

Letter to Mr. and Mrs. Bhatia, November 23, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 24
body:
Regarding a "method" to help you overcome the sadness of old age, the method is to arm yourself with the weapon of knowledge of the self. One has to gain this knowledge not only by study and hearing, but by practical engagement in a way that corresponds to one's status in life.

November 24, 1999, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 23
body:
We cannot give up everything immediately, but we can start by taking one step. If we take one step forward and we will see that actually “Yes, I am experiencing that by following these instructions my life is changing and I am getting some realization”, than we want to take another step.

November 23, 1991, St.Petersburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 25
body:
With foldered hands I request you, don't you become hippers again by growing hair. Keep your head cleansed at least once a month. That is my request. Neither I can chastise you. I am also old man, your are young men.

Vrindavana, November 25, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 24
body:
To the sincere devotee, this ocean of maya is easily crossed by the cool breeze of Krishna's Grase. This is our business, to submit to Krishna's desire to have us back with Him in the eternal sky of Krishna Loka.

Letter to Syamasundara, November 24,1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 26
body:
When we keep our association with Krishna - every activity is proper and liberating, but if we should dissociate ourselves from the Lord's Mercy, then we like a hand which is separated from the body - we become ugly and useless.

Letter to Hrisikesa, November 26, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 26
body:
So Krsna will help you, but you must show Him that you want His help, by praying and chanting... Krsna will certainly reciprocate with one who chants with sincerity. But without chanting it is virtually impossible to develop the required devotional mentality to gain Krsna's favor.

November 26, 1986, Letter to Elise
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 27
body:
The governing principle for our activity should be to do what is favorable for pleasing Krishna.

Letter to Lalita Kumar, November 27, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 27
body:
I am very pleased to hear that all of you are still feeling the weight and are nicely planning your marathon. Please know that I am very grateful to those devotees who take up this important missionary work because it is so pleasing to Srila Prabhupada.

November 27, 1997, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 28
body:
That awakening of compassion, of wanting to see others enjoying the bliss of Krsna consciousness, that is what Lord Caitanya came to give.

November 28, 2007, Hartford
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 28
body:
Fate can be changed by Krishna Consciousness. Krishna says "I shall give you protection from all resultant actions of your sinful life". That is fate changed. When you surrender to Krishna, He takes charge of squaring up all your sinful activities and their reaction. Surrender to Krishna, then your fate is changed.

Delhi, November 28, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 29
body:
Any work that is performed by a devotee in Krishna Consciousness is never work on material platform although it may appear to be so.

Letter to Krishnakanti, November 29, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 29
body:
Devotional service must be rendered with a hankering to advance in spiritual life and this yearning must be within the heart. Then while hearing, chanting, and utilizing our bodies for the service to the Lord, gradually the meditation upon the pleasure of the Lord will increase more and more within the heart.

November 29, 2001, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: November 30
body:
If you do not understanding somebody, how you can love him? Love is far, far away. But Chaitanya Mahaprabhu is so kind that he is distributing Krishna-prema: "Take anyone. Come on".

Bombey, November 30, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: November 30
body:
When a devotee very carefully practices vaidhi bhakti every day, a natural taste for devotional service begins to awaken. Every one of us is looking after some taste, but the taste for material things doesn’t produce any prominent lasting effect. Yet, that higher taste that we are looking for comes from practicing such bhakti.

November 30, 2001, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 1
body:
When a devotee is so fully depended upon the Lord and is always engaged in rendering service to the Lord, He actually takes charge of the devotee’s departure from this world. He carries him across the ocean of repeated birth and death and accepts him into His eternal association in the spiritual world.

December 1, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 1
body:
Because we drink cow’s milk, we should accept the cow as our mother. That is etiquette.

Letter to Nayanabhirama, December 1, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 2
body:
Krishna is the root of everything. If He is pleased, everyone will be pleased. If you pour water on the root, the water will be distributed all over the tree. This is the best service to humanity.

Letter to Mr.Karsan, December 2, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 3
body:
A devotee is not interested in accepting the credit but is simply interested in pleasing the Lord.

December 3, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 2
body:
It is possible to become free from personal motivations when one always thinks, that he has been given this duty - to give Krsna consciousness to others - and sees no qualifications within himself, he thinks: "still, somehow just let me try". That’s all.

December 2, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 3
body:
I see God, and therefore I offer prasadam to Him. Because they cannot see Him, they must come to me so I can open their eyes. They are blind - suffering from cataracts - so I shall operate, and they will see.

Los Angeles, December 3, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 4
body:
Krishna is ready to talk with you. He has come. He has descended in arca-murti to talk with you, to be visible by you. Now you make yourself ready and fit to talk with Krishna. Then He will exchange conversation. This is possible.

Bombay, December 4, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 4
body:
If the Lord sees that our desire is so strong, that we want this person genuinely to take one of Srila Prabhupada’s books, He can dictate in such a way that the person will actually take the book.

December 4, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 5
body:
We should not be thinking so much about how the criterion of success is always the result, but how we are developing our attachment to Krsna.

December 5, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 5
body:
If one purposefully commits mistake and sinful life, “Now I am chanting Hare Krishna. I can do all sinful life, it will become counteracted,” that rascal will be punished very very much. “I am living in Vrindavana. Oh, it is dhama, so let me do all nonsense. It will be counteracted.” They’ll be these cats and dogs and monkeys in Vrindavana.

Vrindavan, December 5, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 6
body:
Devotees, they are para-duhkha-duhkhi. The symptom of a devotee is they are unhappy by seeing others unhappy.

Ahmedabad, December 6, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 6
body:
As soon as one forgets that he is dependent on Krsna, immediately the powerful illusory energy covers him. That’s how powerful illusory energy is.

December 6, 1994, Doneck
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 8
body:
We are not enemies of machine. If they can be used for Krishna’s service then we welcome them.

Letter to Kirtanananda, December 8, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 8
body:
When one acts in false ego, he can’t hear Krsna’s instructions and becomes lost. So this minute independence is there within the heart of every living being and the spiritual master must continue to give transcendental knowledge and the disciple must be a proper receptacle by which he can receive that transcendental knowledge.

December 8, 1994, Donetsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 9
body:
Who feels humble and meek has the door for the Kingdome of God opened for him or her.

Letter to Janaki, December 9, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 10
body:
Devotee means very liberal and kind to everyone, always gentleman under all kinds of conditions of life.

Letter to Hamsaduta, December 10, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 11
body:
Vrndavan means Vrndavan consciousness and to be in such consciousness it is not required that one be in that place of Vrndavan. One just has to associate with those who are in Vrndavana consciousness.

December 11, 1994, Simferopol
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 11
body:
When we simply remember to accept the control of Krishna and not to act independently then all fortune is automatically present.

Letter to Brahmananda, Decembeк 11, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 12
body:
One who is always trying to be engaged in Krsna’s service will accept whatever duties are given to him and he will always try the best he can. This is the most important consciousness that he has in execution of his duties, that he does it for Krsna and is not attached to the results.

December 12, 1994, Simferopol
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 12
body:
In Vaikuntha there are thousands times beautiful women and thousands times strong men, but there is no sex desire. They are so much absorbed in Krishna consciousness that sex life is very insignificant. There is no sex life in the Vaikuntha realm.

Vrindavan, December 12, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 13
body:
God’s business is to protect the faithful and kill the demons. Therefore we find lord Visnu, the four symbolic representations: for killing, the club and the chakra; and for protecting, the lotus flower and conchshell.

Indore, December 13, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 14
body:
When we chant, we should chant with a desire to chant purely, without any offense, free from anarthas. This requires practice and so must be practiced daily.

December 14, 2001, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 14
body:
"Sir, I am suffering from some disease, so without going to the doctor, and saving so much money, let me pay hundred rupees to the sadhu and he’ll give me blessings. So I will save thousands of rupees, for curing the disease." For this purpose they go to sadhu. Nobody goes to sadhu for going back to home, back to Godhead.

New Delhi, December 14, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 15
body:
Chanting should be performed with some feeling. Whether the emotion is hankering for Krsna, remorse, repentance, eagerness to chant more attentively, remembrance of our favorite pastime, or whatever, when there is some feeling, our chanting becomes less mechanical and more spontaneous.

December 15, 2006, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 15
body:
There is need of a clue as to how humanity can become one in peace, friendship and prosperity with a common cause. Srimad-Bhagavatam will fill this need, for it is a cultural presentation for the respiritualization of the entire human society.

Delhi, December 15, 1962
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 16
body:
When one hankers for Krsna, one hankers for devotional service. And the more one hankers, the more one becomes purified.

December 16, 1994, Odessa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 17
body:
First we have simply to hear. That’s the most important thing. Gradually as the mind becomes purified, then one is able to understand how Krsna is present in His name, but we have to purify the mind by sound vibration.

December 17, 1994, Odessa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 16
body:
One can take service from a particular type of well for a particular purpose, but if he goes to the ever-flowing river, all water purposes will be served there. So if you take Krishna consciousness, then all the purposes of different types of wells is served in the ever-flowing river of Krishna consciousness.

Los Angeles, December 16, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 17
body:
Every one of us is searching after some mellow, some pleasure from everything. Krishna is the reservoir of all pleasures, rasa-vigraha, fully personified. Whenever there is Krishna, there is rasa, a transcendental mellow, enjoyment, relishable.

Surat, December 17, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 20
body:
Therefore devotees always keep themselves in humble position by offering everything to the Lord. They accept whatever the Lord provides for them and this is the principle for spiritual economics.

December 20, 1997, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 20
body:
If one can please a pure devotee of the Lord, such action means immediate satisfaction of the Lord, even though such a person is not officially qualified to receive the mercy of the Lord.

Letter to Yeager, December 20, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 22
body:
We must get devotional service from somebody who has devotional service and develop the desire to obtain it. If one does not have that desire, then one will not be able to ever understand the mysteries of devotional service.

December 22, 1997, Riga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 22
body:
There is no limit to perfection—we may go on improving more and more, and still there is no limit to how much we may please Krishna, just like for the materialist there is no limit to how much Maya kick us!

Letter to Balavanta, December 22, 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 23
body:
If we actually want to have prominent connection with Krsna, we have to be situated in devotional service and then the connection becomes very strong because Krsna doesn’t let go.

December 23, 1997, Tallin
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 23
body:
Anukarana, anusarana, there are two Sanskrit words. One is imitation, and one is following the footprints. If one tries to follow the footprints of great personalities, that is very nice, but we cannot imitate. Imitation is dangerous.

Los Angeles, December 23, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 25
body:
Relationships which exist between the servant and the master is that the servant always thinks himself as servant and the Lord sometimes places that servant in the position as His master.

December 25, 1997, Tallin
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 25
body:
Simply propagate this chanting, dancing, feasting and following the regulative principles. These are the four pillars of our success.

Letter to Krsna das, December 25, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 26
body:
Laksmi, the godess of fortune, is called cancala. She does not remain at one place. Today one man is very rich; next generation is no longer rich. If you are actually religious, then don’t spoil your money for sense gratification. Use it for service of Krishna. If you have got some money, try to construct a very nice temple for Krishna’s situation. That is proper use.

Bombay, December 26, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 26
body:
We always have this conception that to achieve perfection of life means to take a journey, to go some place else besides being here. But actually if one transforms his consciousness, then wherever he is, is Vrndavan. The state of pure Krsna consciousness means that one has reached Krsna. Therefore the perfectional stage of life can be achieved when one is still within this body.

December 26, 1997, Kaunas
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 27
body:
The business of leader: he must be himself always enthusiastic and inspire others to be always enthusiastic. Then he is real leader.

Letter to Trai das, December 27, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 29
body:
Bhismadeva was a military man so he was pleased to see Krishna in military spirit, as much as the Gopis wanted to see Krishna as the most beautiful lover. Krishna can be loved in any feature and because He is absolute there is no difference to love Krishna as a military man or as a simple Gopi.

Letter to Jadurani, December 29, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 29
body:
It is the spiritual master's duty to train his disciples, and humility and pridelessness are the ornaments of all Gaudiya Vaisnava’s.

December 29, 2001, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 30
body:
So real value of human life is to awaken the Lords pleasure and the Lord is pleased when His pure devotees are pleased.

December 30, 2007, Budapest
author: Niranjana Swami

title: December 30
body:
There is a proverb in Bengali that one person wanted to see how many thieves are there in this village, and when he began to scrutinize, he saw that everyone is thief. Similarly, in this world you go to anyone, they are all envious of God.

Los Angeles, December 30, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 31
body:
In Vrndavana everyone is overwhelmed with love of Krishna. When they cannot find Krishna, they become mad. Although they do not know that Krishna is God. This is pure love, without any knowledge of the supreme powerful, almighty. No contamination - pure love.

Bombay, December 31, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: December 31
body:
Devotee’s think, “Who am I? I simply belong to Krsna and therefore my only duty is to satisfy His desires.”

December 31, 2002, Kharkov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 1
body:
Please continue to work with determination and great faith in Krsna and Guru and full cooperation of your God-brothers and fellow members of the Governing Body. If you all keep to the standard practices of pure spiritual life as I have humbly instructed you, there is no doubt that this Sankirtana Movement of Lord Caitanya will overtake all the earth and all opposing parties will be cracked down to nothing.

Letter to Karandhara dasa, 1 January 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 1
body:
Therefore we should be prepared to strictly follow, if we actually want to achieve the dust from the lotus feet of the devotees of the Lord.

January 1, 1995, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 3
body:
Go on selling books. My Guru Maharaja was very much anxious about selling books and preaching, so you are pleasing him by this bombastic flood of books all over the world.

Letter to Ramesvara Prabhu, Nellore, 3 January, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 3
body:
When one comes in contact with pure devotional service, then one has an opportunity to purify the heart. Even though we may not be pure, we must follow those, who are pure. We must render assistance and serve those, who are pure.

January 3, 1995, St. Peterburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 4
body:
We should never think of our so-called advancement as being conditioned by or dependent upon some set of material circumstances such as marriage, vanaprastha, or this or that. Mature understanding of Krsna consciousness means that whatever condition of life I am in at present, that is Krsna's special mercy upon me, therefore let me take advantage in the best way possible to spread this Krsna consciousness movement and conduct my spiritual master's mission. If I consider my own personal progress or happiness or any other thing personal, that is material consideration.

Letter to Madhukara dasa, 4 January, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 4
body:
Even the one moment of contact with devotional service actually enables us to begin the path of unmotivated and uninterrupted devotional service.

January 4, 2009, Boston
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 5
body:
Everything should be done co-operatively. "Our'' and "your's'' are material conceptions and have no place in our Krishna Consciousness movement. If the members of our movement are unable to co-operate it will be very difficult to spread the mission of Lord Caitanya.

Letter to Satsvarupa Maharaja, Nellore, 5 January, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 6
body:
So the first medicine which you should be concerned with is to chant Hare Krishna and to become increasingly steady in Krishna Consciousness. Study Bhagavad-gita As It Is and Srimad-Bhagavatam and continue to help your god-brothers in developing Krishna Consciousness. So develop your preaching abilities in this way, and this will be the most successful and appreciated endeavor.

Letter to Upendra dasa, 6 January, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 5
body:
In other words, if a person has so much knowledge, but if did not use it to glorify devotional service, then he simply uses it to glorify himself.

January 5, 1998, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 6
body:
Devotee means one, whose happiness is dependent only upon Krsna's happiness. And that exactly what Krsna is looking for in the heart of His devotee.

January 6, 1996, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 8
body:
Your emphasis on book distribution is quite right. I can understand in the northern centers it is very cold now, and yet you report they are still going out for sankirtana party. Please convey that I extend all blessings to those boys and girls who are trying to distribute our books even under difficult conditions.

Letter to Jagadisa dasa, 8 January, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 8
body:
To be chastised, instructed or corrected is not a sign of rejection. On the contrary, our acaryas have taught that to be an object by any one, two or all three is a sign of acceptance.

January 8, 2006, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 9
body:
Regarding astrology, you should not listen to any of these so-called astrologers. Don't even see them. What is the use of seeing them? Astrology is meant for the materialist, but a spiritualist does not care for the future. Everything is dependent upon Krishna.

Letter to Devamaya devi dasi, 9 January, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 9
body:
Krsna's holy names will act to clear away the obstacles in your life. If you make a regular practice of this, and continue to chant after sincerely praying in this way, as much as possible, you will get strength.

January 9, 2002, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 10
body:
The more we sell books, the more we advance in KC, and the more we help others to have solid information how they may take advantage of their human form of life and achieve the supreme perfection.

Letter to Kulasekhara dasa, 10 January, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 10
body:
Moreover, as your instinctive faith becomes more mature by association with more advanced devotees, the fear of losing the attachments will gradually diminish.

January 10, 2001, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 11
body:
The thing is, everyone of us should think as servant of Krishna. In the service of Krishna there may be sometimes transcendental competition but there cannot be any disruption.

Letter to Rayarama dasa, 11 January, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 11
body:
In other words when a person is actually self-controlled, he becomes very powerful in his ability to influence others. He is not controlled by the whims of others. Because he is not controlled by his own whims. He is fixed in his purpose in life.

January 11, 1997, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 12
body:
Our philosophy is "simple living and high thinking'', not sense gratification. The temple presidents and leaders (elder students) must show this by example. Temple or asrama means for renunciation and renounced persons. If one is engaged in self-realization process, then his material necessities become almost nil. Persons who do not like this can work outside.

Letter to Kirtiraja dasa, 12 January, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 12
body:
If one has a particular service to Krishna, but if his meditation is on rejection of that service for accepting another service - this is not favorable.

January 12, 1997, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 14
body:
Regarding love affairs in the material world: they are only shadows or reflections of the real love with Krishna. If you love Krishna in any capacity, you shall never be frustrated because everything in Krishna is perfect, eternal, blissful, and full of knowledge. So continue your present activities and chant your beads.

Letter to Kancanbala devi dasi, Los Angeles, 14 January, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 14
body:
This body exists. It’s real. But what is false? When I think: “it is me”.

January 14, 1998, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 15
body:
Each and every living entity is an individual soul and as such disagreement is quite possible in our dealings with one another but we have to consider the central point of interest. Do not take at any time an attitude of non-cooperation because you may have not agreed with another's point of view.

Letter to Yamuna devi dasi and Harsarani devi dasi, 15 January, 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 15
body:
So certainly, whatever obstacles are placed before the path of the devotees, individually and collectively, they can be overcome by the mercy of the Lord, and Krsna will remove all obstacles from the path of devotional service for one, who has full determination in the course of executing his duties in Krsna consciousness.

January 15, 1996, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 16
body:
Our movement is based on love and trust, so if we do not co-operate, then how is that love and trust? Follow all of the rules and regulations very strictly without deviation, chant 16 rounds, attend class and mangala arati and then everything will be alright.

Letter to Krsnavesa devi dasi, 16 January, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 18
body:
Please do your duty combinedly without any disruption of peaceful attitudes amongst yourselves. We are pushing our movement on the background of a peaceful atmosphere in the world, and if we show a little disturbance in our own camp that will not be a very good example. Therefore, everyone should be forebearing, tolerant and cooperative. That is my special request to you all.

Letter to Janaki devi dasi, 18 January, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 18
body:
The point is that although our desires do need to be fulfilled, we should let Krsna fulfill them rather than attempting to artificially fulfill them ourselves. Therefore a person is best situated for purification who depends upon Krsna for the fulfillment of all of his needs.

January 18, 1997, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 19
body:
So, any devotee executing any one of the nine is transcendentally glorious. One devotee may be proud that his process of service is the best. That is not inglorious. This is called transcendental competition. Everyone should feel proud of his particular type of devotional service, but that does not mean that other types of service are inferior. Everyone should feel proud of becoming sincere servant of Krishna, but the pure devotee never minimizes the importance of other devotees.

Letter to Satsvarupa Maharaja, 19 January, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 19
body:
Progress means feeling that we are unworthy of mercy, we are in need of more and more mercy, and that we are not doing enough service for Krishna's pleasure.

January 19, 2007, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 20
body:
So far making tapes of Ajamila series, I have told Los Angeles tape-making operation that they should distribute to our devotees at cost price to nondevotee that is another thing. We should not make exorbitant profit by exploiting each other in the matter of vital Krishna Consciousness paraphernalia such as books, tapes, etc. which are vital for our preaching work and for the devotees' personal advancement in Krishna Consciousness.

Letter to Hamsaduta dasa, 20 January, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 22
body:
Don't give them [books] freely. There should be either the option to pay or return. Neither you should give the books to the Librarians of public and hospital libraries, it will not be fruitful. They have their managing committee's, so approach these men individually to purchase books for the libraries.

Letter to Jayatirtha dasa, 22 January, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 20
body:
The only way how we can learn, how to please the Lord, is by associating with the devotees, who are pleasing the Lord.

January 20, 2002, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 22
body:
Sraddha means to have complete faith, that without chanting the Holy Name, all one's subsidiary duties (work, family, society, body, pious activity, etc.) will always remain incomplete. Incomplete fulfillment of duties means incomplete fulfillment of the self.

January 22, 2002, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 23
body:
You are right when you write to say that everything about us, tables, chairs, bricks etc. is originally emanating from sound vibration. This is also admitted in the Christian Bible wherein it is said that God said, Let there be creation. So actually the transcendental sound is the cause of creation, but material sound is not transcendental sound. We have to receive transcendental sound through the transcendental channel, therefore, Vedas are called Sruti. That means transcendental sound can be received through the ear. And by hearing this transcendental sound through the ear our heart becomes spiritually purified, and we can realize at that stage the transcendental Name, transcendental Qualities, transcendental Form, transcendental Pastimes etc. That is the way of descending process.

Letter to Hamsaduta dasa, 23 January, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 23
body:
The Lord always protects. He protects vows of His devotees. He protects the desires of His devotees. He protects the heart of the devotee.(…) We should always seek of that protection of the Lord, and then, one who actually is under that protection, one who sees the Lords participation in his life and sees His kindness and His mercy, however it manifests, he will always be protected by the Lord.

January 23, 2005, Pune yatra
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 24
body:
I have received your invitation to the opening of Prasadam Distributing International Inc., and I found it nicely presented. Krsna will give you intelligence how to engage in honest, brilliant, glorious work on His behalf. There is no need to engage in anything dishonest. Krsna has given enough money, now earn by honest means.

Letter to Alex, Bob, Drdhavrata, Gupta, Rsabhadeva, Stan, 24 January, 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 24
body:
Hearing and chanting without inspiration can become simply another ritual. But when a devotee is genuinely inspired, he can have a positive influence on others.

January 24, 2007, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 25
body:
The reports of increased book sales all over the world gives me so much pleasure. I thank you very much for your very determined efforts to push on this movement of Caitanya Mahaprabhu.

Letter to Karandhara dasa, 25 January, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 25
body:
If we don’t appreciate the value, then there is no desire to reciprocate. We have to be very very careful not to become familiar to the process of bhakti.

January 25, 2001, Dnepropetrovsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 26
body:
Be sure to chant your sixteen rounds daily and read one chapter of Bhagavad-gita As It Is, one chapter daily. Follow the four regulative principles strictly, and I am sure that Krishna will see that your life quickly becomes more and more happy in devotional service. The attitude which you expressed is very nice, and please continue to develop this attitude always.

Letter to Arundhati devi dasi, 26 January, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 26
body:
We should become so pure, that even if people coming forward to serve with the desire to take, we should deal with them in such a way, that their hearts become pure.

January 26, 2002, Dnepropetrovsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: January 31
body:
The deity worship must be completely pure in terms of cleanliness and punctuality, otherwise there will be some offense.

Letter to Sri Govinda dasa, 31 January, 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: January 31
body:
There is no potency if one is not strict within. It’s simply a show. One can’t be potent in trying to convince others if he is not following himself.

January 31, 1998, St Petersburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 4
body:
People should not expect that even in the Krishna Consciousness Society there will be Utopia. Because devotees are persons, therefore there will always be some lacking, but the difference is that their lacking, because they have given up everything to serve Krishna - money, jobs, reputation, wealth, big educations, everything - their lackings have become transcendental.

Letter to Atreya Rsi dasa, 4 February 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 4
body:
So the Lord is simply enjoying. And that is the description of the spiritual world. In order to understand the spiritual world and Krsna's personality, one must understand a little something about the relationships between the Lord and the living beings. This is called bhakti, or love.

February 4, 1997, Bryansk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 5
body:
Our Vaisnava religion is so vast that we can supply millions of pictures and hundreds and thousands of literary contributions in this paper. In Christian religion they have got pictures like the Crucifixion and a few similar others. In the Buddhist religion they have got the picture of the Lord Buddha. In Mohammedan religion they have got picture of Mecca Medina, and I do not know what is the picture in the Jewish religion. But so far as our Krishna Consciousness is concerned, we can supply millions of pictures of Krishna, Visnu, and Their multi-incarnations, as well as Their transcendental Pastimes.

Letter to Brahmananda dasa, 5 February 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 5
body:
There is always the struggle, but Krsna knows our desire. And when he sees us struggling for Him, He promises to preserve whatever we have and to carry whatever we are lacking.

February 5, 1987, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 6
body:
Regarding the Nectar of Instruction, why not distribute it to the common men? Every book is meant for everyone, but especially for the devotees. Please try to print a large number so that it can be distributed just like Sri Isopanisad.

Letter to Ramesvara dasa, 6 February 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 6
body:
We actually have to serve those, who have Krishna’s attention, and in this way we can do something which is pleasing to Krishna. This is how we actually approach the Lord.

February 6, 1997, Voronezh
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 7
body:
Why you should be sorry if someone says you are Indian, he is American, Indians are no good, Americans are good. Why be affected by bodily relationships? Sri Caitanya Mahaprabhu has advised us - and as an older, grownup student you should know it - that we have to become humbler than the blade of grass and more tolerant than the tree, and then we can execute our service and chant Hare Krsna.

Letter to Caitya-guru dasa, 7 February 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 7
body:
To work in Krsna consciousness we must know what does Krsna want from us. It we don’t know that, we must learn what does Krsna want us to do.

February 7, 1997, Voronezh
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 15
body:
Do not let your mind be disturbed by so many things. Our movement is for chanting Hare Krishna. One can be happy under any condition. Samah duhkha-sukham dhiram. Krishna Consciousness does not depend on any external arrangement. You should not go outside of the shelter of this ISKCON. Just try to be happy by chanting Hare Krishna and following the regulative principles.

Letter to Krishnanga devi dasi, 15 February 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 15
body:
That is how a devotee must think: "How can I get this person to take shelter into the lotus feet of Krsna?" When devotee actually has this desire within his heart, then he preaches with that strong desire and Krsna helps him.

February 15, 1994, Riga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 16
body:
Thank you again and again for distributing my books with great enthusiasm. Now, try to double this enthusiasm. Anyone who even touches one of our books gets such great benefit. Give them to everyone. Because you are all very sincere and working very hard, Krishna is giving you all facilities.

Letter to Dina Bandhu dasa, 16 February 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 16
body:
Therefore, in order for the disciple to increase his attachment and relationship to the spiritual master, the disciple must be eager to hear his instructions given in his lectures and books.

February 16, 2002, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 17
body:
My advise is always chant 16 rounds minimum and follow the four regulative principles. Disagreements will continue in this material world. So one may live in a suitable place, but one must follow these five principles. My disciples must follow these principles living either in heaven or hell.

Letter to Raja Laksmi devi dasi, 17 February 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 17
body:
One becomes purified by confronting difficulties, which he has in executing of his duties. Not by avoiding them. This is the essence of the teachings of Bhagavad Gita.

February 17, 1998, Almaty
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 18
body:
Our Isopanisad is now published. This excellent book of God-Consciousness should be introduced as study book for school and college students because it is so nicely explained about God-Consciousness. Any sincere gentleman serious about knowing God-Consciousness must read this book. A little education will make every one aware what is meant by God. It is a challenge to the atheists, agnostic, skeptics and gross materialists.

Letter Kirtanananda Maharaja, 18 February 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 18
body:
Krsna can only be known when He lets Himself to know. Even if we want to think of Krsna, Krsna has to agree to appear in our minds.

February 18, 1994, Riga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 19
body:
The proper method of dressing Jagannatha is as a ksatriya King and there is no limit to the opulence you can give Him.

Letter to Kirtika devi dasi, 19 February 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 20
body:
Regular and attentive chanting, along with following the four regulative principles will keep one pure. Simply by following these principles and chanting Hare Krishna one can make his life successful and perfect.
So far your two lost beads are concerned, you can simply add two more beads, and because I have already chanted on all the others, they will be sanctified also.

Letter to Tosana, 20 February 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 20
body:
Devotees have no personal investment in their dealings - at least serious devotees. They get their fulfillment from a place beyond their day-to-day social dealings. Giving without expectation of return is the platform from which serious devotees operate.

February 20, 2010, Blog
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 21
body:
I especially appreciate your attitude toward increasing more and more the sales of our books, that will sanctify all other activities of preaching because preaching means selling books.

Letter Bhakta dasa, 21 February 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 21
body:
You must balance your life in such a way, that you can optimize whatever time you have for your daily sadhana for increasing your remembrance of Krsna. If you make this duty a solid commitment in your life, then you will see that this life will go by very quickly, and, towards the end of this life, there will be nothing which will make you want to come back to this world again.

February 21, 2002, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 22
body:
Now the policy should be straight that this Back to Godhead is completely different from all other magazines. As there are different magazines for different subject matters, this magazine will be simply devoted for Vaisnava philosophy, or Krishna Consciousness movement. That should be our policy.

Letter to Rayarama, 22 February 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: 23 февраля
body:
Мы должны постоянно помнить, что находимся в царстве майи, и ее влияние здесь очень сильно. Так что, если мы не будем очень и очень осторожными в своих делах, всегда будет вероятность падения. Поэтому, пожалуйста, регулярно повторяй на четках шестнадцать кругов и соблюдай регулирующие принципы.

Письмо Харер Наме, 23 февраля, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 23
body:
I am always grateful to read about my disciples' "inner" lives and not just what they are doing externally. The substance of our Krsna consciousness movement lies in the inner lives of our devotees.

February 23, 2003, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 24
body:
We want to influence these misguided college students so that they might take to this Krishna Consciousness Movement very seriously. And if we can establish a seat of Krishna Consciousness these students may take their doctorate degree in Krishna Consciousness and go out and preach all over the world.

Letter to Tulsi dasa, 24 February 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 24
body:
Nonetheless, as long as one has a material body, devotees still must engage in social dealings. But they know that these affairs do not give them internal satisfaction. The body needs to be maintained if we want to use it for hearing and chanting. Devotees therefore need to discuss or deal with these matters in a minimal way so that the real purpose of maintaining the body is not forgotten.

February 24, 2010, Blog
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 25
body:
There are no such distinctions of higher and lower on the transcendental platform. The important thing is that we are engaging our time and energy in the service of the Lord.

Letter to Karunamayi devi dasi, 25 February 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 26
body:
By no means should you stop kirtana and chanting. Of course I know that you cannot stop kirtana or chanting but it must be done regularly because that is our strength. We are always in the whirlpool of maya, and only this chanting of Mantra can save us from all pitfalls.

Letter to Pradyumna dasa, 26 February 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 26
body:
There are so many pitfalls to management. If one is not careful, he can easily fall into them without realizing how it has happened. But, if you do not allow the pressures of management to influence your chanting, your sadhana, and your reading of Srila Prabhupada's books, then you will have the strength to avoid these pitfalls.

February 26, 2003, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: February 27
body:
Regarding what to do with the eyes while on Sankirtana, your suggestion to look into the faces of people and try to convince them of the sincerity of our movement is best. There is no need of artificial things like seeing the spirit soul. We talk, and we talk on Krsna topics - that is all.

Letter to Jagadisa dasa, 27 February 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 28
body:
This sound vibration is not material, it is spiritual, and powerful beyond our conception. So it cannot be hindered in any way by something material; it surpasses all these material barriers. So you can know it that when you are chanting, you are also giving benefit to even the child in the womb.

Letter to Mukunda dasa and Janaki devi dasi, 28 February 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: February 28
body:
So the Lord is equal to everyone. But a devotee of the Lord understands the purpose of the Lord, and therefore a devotee of the Lord can be even more merciful, because the devotee will preach.

February 28, 2010, Budapest
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 6
body:
Keep your health in good condition and work very hard for Krishna. That is our motto of life.

Letter to Rayarama, March 6, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 6
body:
Therefore Krsna manifests himself through His devotees. Those who have pure devotional service to Krsna, control Krsna and they have Krsna. And they can give Krsna to others.

March 6, 2009, Taipei, Taiwan
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 7
body:
To serve the servant of Krsna is better than to serve directly Krsna, because if the servant of Krsna promises something, if the servant of Krishna says, "I`ll take you to Krsnaloka," you must go there.

Mayapur, March 7, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 7
body:
And even there may be appear some fault, even there may be appear some conflict, if everyone is trying to please Krsna, then that is the platform of harmony.

March 7, 2007, Hartford
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 10
body:
In this age, Kali-yuga, to kill the demons means to stop their demonic activities by weapon of kirtana, hari-sankirtana, which
is spread by Lord Chaitanya`s associates.

London, March 10, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 10
body:
One must have the authority of the Lord to be successful in spreading Krishna consciousness. And this authority is only invested in one, who is the servant of a Vaisnava. Being the servant of a Vaisnava, the authority comes down from Krishna. And Krishna empowers one to spread the Holy Name.

March 10, 1991, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 11
body:
It is the duty of the disciple that even if the spiritual master, or senior acharya, agrees to be defeated, it is the duty of the disciple to see that his spiritual master and superior is not defeated.

Vrindavan, March 11, 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 11
body:
We have nothing to be proud of. Anyone who takes birth within this material world has nothing to be proud of.

March 11, 1993, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 12
body:
Simply by changing dress, one does not improve unless he seriously takes the principles of devotional service. But in Kali-yuga, they`ll think, "Because I have changed my dress, I have become a big sannyasi." You see? "Because I have got a sacred thread, now I am a brahmana." No. There must be regular training.

Vrindavan, March 12, 1974
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 12
body:
So these books are like the places of pilgrimage for the swans. They are only for persons who have some attraction for spiritual realm. But the most wonderful thing about these books is that even somebody doesn’t have any attraction, if they get one eleventh of the moment of association with Srila Prabhupada, that attraction can be awakened. That is the great beauty of these books. Although they are made for swan like persons, by associating with these books even the ugliest crows can become swans.

March 12, 1991, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 19
body:
We act according to our whims, and the resultant action is there immediately. Nature`s law, God`s law is there. It is not God`s creation that somebody is suffering from some painful condition and somebody is enjoying. No. We infect ourselves with some contamination because this material world is full of contamination. You must remain very cautious. Otherwise you will have to suffer.

Mayapur, March 19, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 19
body:
There is only one solution to our problems. This material world is no place for any gentlemen and we should not want to stay here any longer. The real solution is to go back to Godhead and that’s why Krsna wants to bring every one of us back to the spiritual world.

March 19, 1991, Kishiniov
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 22
body:
We can ask favour from anyone, but we must know that nobody can favour us unless sanctioned by the Supreme Person. Suppose we approach rich man to favour us with some contribution. Krishna is there within, and if he says, "You give him this money", the man will give us. If he is not so fortunate now therefore Krishna did not dictate him. So there is nothing to be sorry. This should be our principle.

Mayapur, March 22, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 22
body:
For a devotee, "hell" means forgetfulness of Krsna. However, the devotee does not pray to Krsna to be delivered from hell. A devotee simply prays that the Lord will situate him in a place that will allow him to remember the Lord.

March 22, 2002, Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 24
body:
Radha-Krishna. Radha`s name is first. Why? Nobody can be better devotee than Radharani. As soon as Radha`s name is there, Krishna is more pleased. That is the way. If we glorify the devotee, the character of the devotees, before the Lord, He is more pleased than to glorify Himself, Him directly.

Hawaii, March 24, 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 24
body:
To become empowered means to become an instrument of the Lord. Therefore Lord acts through such devotees, who are giving up all personal concern and voluntarily renouncing such materialistic tendencies for the service of Krsna.

March 24, 1992, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 25
body:
When the soul leaves this body, then what it is? It has no value, a lump of matter, just like a motorcar. So long it is
moving, it is worth one lakh and so long it does not move, it is simply lump of iron and cooper and something. Who cares for it? It is thrown away. Same things. The body has no value. It has value so long the soul is there.

Delhi, March 25, 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 25
body:
In other words, devotional service begins on the liberated platform, when one becomes free from all material designations.

March 25, 1992, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 26
body:
Krishna and Balarama, They are Absolute Truth.There is no difference between killing and loving. Those who were killed, you know they were also delivered from this material bondage. Now these same two brothers have again descended as Sri Krishna Chaitanya-Nityananda.

Mayapur, March 26, 1975
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 26
body:
Surrender is not something of the past. Surrender is something very dynamic. It is every moment. It is an ongoing process. At every moment of one's life, one is actually thinking how to surrender more and more.

March 26, 1996, Suharevo
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 28
body:
You should not keep your trust on so-called gentlemen of the world however nicely dressed he may be. In the matter of discharging our mission of Krishna consciousness we have to meet so many so-called gentlemen, but we must be very cautious for dealing with them as we are cautious in dealing with serpants.

Letter to Brahmananda, March 28, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 28
body:
What attracts others to Krsna is sanatana dharma, not upadharma. Upadharma means it’s not eternal, therefore Krsna is not present there. How can you attract someone to Krsna if Krsna is not present there?

March 28, 1992, Dnepropetrovsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: March 30
body:
I am aware that you are feeling my absence just as I am feeling the absence from you. But in the meantime this must be so and Krishna will provide for you as long as you keep chanting Hare Krishna.

Letter to Devotees, March 30, 1967
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: March 30
body:
And because the soul is eternal and Krsna is eternal, the message that Krsna is giving to Arjuna is accepted as Absolute Truth.

March 30, 1996, Ekaterinburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 1
body:
Now you are beginning to preach at the universities. That is a very good program, so increase it more and more. It is also a good opportunity for distributing our books. You should give much effort for book distribution, it is such a valuable service. So somehow or other distribute these books, either in schools and colleges, libraries, through life membership, bookstores, or wherever else you think they might be accepted. Do so with enthusiasm and determination and Krishna will surely help you.

Letter to Nityananda dasa, 1 April 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 1
body:
Krsna is like sunshine and maya is like darkness. Because maya always thinks herself as Krsna's servant, she wont stand in front of Krsna. If Krsna is there, she always stands behind. This is proper etiquette.

April 1, 1992, Odessa
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 2
body:
Also we have formed the Bhaktivedanta Institute for organizing scientific presentations of Krishna Consciousness. This party is our most important preaching arm with which we will be able to destroy the bogus speculation and cheating which goes under the banner of scientific advancement.

Letter to Dravida dasa, 2 April 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 2
body:
Love does not mean desireless - to be free from desires. Love means to purify desires.

April 2, 2004, Donetsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 3
body:
So competition, disagreement, or even dissension, if they are there, and the center is Krishna, such disagreement is not material.

Letter to Krsna dasa, 3 April 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 3
body:
If you want to pay a debt to the spiritual master, then you have to make this life your last life.

April 3, 2004, Donetsk - Meeting with disciples
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 4
body:
Simply use this marital life for spreading the glories of Lord Krishna and in this very lifetime you will be promoted to associate with Krishna in Goloka Vrindaban.

Letter to: Vaikunthanatha and Saradia, 4 April 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 5
body:
I was just thinking of teaching our students the pronunciation of the Sanskrit verses in the Bhagavad-gita, Srimad-bhagavatam, etc. and by Krsna's will you have already begun this. It will be a great help for me if the students are taught to pronounce in Sanskrit vibration. It will be another effect of transcendental sound vibration. But we should always remember that our aim is spiritual realization, so in such classes in the beginning there must be Kirtana and at the end also there must be Kirtana.

Letter to Pradyumna dasa, 5 April, 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 4
body:
Unless one is been empowered by the Lord, one cannot distribute the Holy Name of the Lord.

April 4, 1999, Vilnius
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 5
body:
What is the symptom of full satisfaction? The symptom of full satisfaction is no longer any hankering or lamentation. One who is satisfied means all his desires are fulfilled.

April 5, 2009, Taichung
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 6
body:
Our students should be taught English and Sanskrit so in the future they can read our books. That will make them MA, PhD. That much I want. Other things are external. And their behavior and character must also be most upstanding.

Letter to Jagadisa dasa, 6 April 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 6
body:
This is how devotee becomes powerful - he invokes the power of Krsna by his humility.

April 6, 1993, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 7
body:
We especially have to try to attract the educated young men and women in your country so that in future there will be many strong leaders to keep our Krsna Consciousness Movement strong.

Letter to Govinda dasa, 7 April 1973
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 7
body:
Therefore the vaisnavas, the devotees of the Lord, are not interested in attaining any of these particular types of destinations. Vaishnavas are simply interested in achieving the lotus feet of the Lord.

April 7, 1998, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 8
body:
You don't want to become a great artist to satisfy the senses of the public. If your present paintings are not acceptable to the general public, I do not mind; they are fools. You continue trying your best to make your pictures as far they can be nice looking, but not to satisfy the senses of the rascal public.

Letter to Jadurani devi dasi, 8 April 1968
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 8
body:
To work without attachment to the results means to be able to work for the satisfaction of Krsna.

April 8, 1992, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 9
body:
The temples must be maintained.

Letter to Rupanuga, 9 April 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 9
body:
Krishna wants to fulfill our desires. Even if we want to enjoy separately from Him, Krishna will fulfill those desires. But because Krishna wants us to go back home, back to Godhead - even more then we want to go - He fulfills our desires in such a way that we are still not happy. That’s Krishna's mercy. That’s called 'causeless mercy'.

April 9, 1992, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 10
body:
Regarding Jadurani's question, hearing the vibration of Hare Krishna automatically reminds one of Krishna's Pastimes. So both of them arise simultaneously in the mind when one is sincerely chanting. So you cannot make any distinction between listening to the sound and thinking of the Pastimes. But the process is to hear, and then Krishna's Pastimes, Form, Qualities, etc. will automatically come to mind: That is very nice.

Letter to Satsvarupa dasa, 10 April 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 10
body:
The energy that covers the living entity and makes him forget is controlled by Krishna. Therefore that same energy can be removed by Krishna because it always under Krishna’s control.

April 10, 1996, Minsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 11
body:
At every stage we have to hear about Krishna. Then gradually we will become detached and our attraction to Krishna will become fixed, at which point real devotional service begins. In the association of devotees who awaken the desire [to hear about Krishna], we will avoid becoming complacent about spiritual life.

April 11, 2004, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 11
body:
Your program of door to door Sankirtana is very encouraging. The more men understand the importance of our movement, the more they will invite us to their homes and clubs, because Krishna Consciousness is the life-giving ambrosia. So increase this program more and more and we shall be able to distribute all our books, which is even more important than membership. Of course, if we can do both at the same time, that is best.

Letter to Bhagavan dasa, 11 April 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 12
body:
I am very pleased to know that you are feeling happy in your execution of devotional service. Service of Krishna's devotees is the highest stage of spiritual perfection, so your desire to render service to the other devotees is very nice. You keep this humble attitude always, and your example will be a source of spiritual inspiration for everyone.

Letter to Anuttama, 12 April 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 12
body:
All that sense gratification in this life will get you so much suffering in your next life. And the foolish materialist, he looks at that and he is envious: ‘He is enjoying. I want to enjoy just like he does.’ That means ‘I want to suffer just like he will suffer'.

April 12, 1994, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 13
body:
Transcendental jealousy is not wrong but it is absolute. In the transcendental world there are jealous parties also like the party of Radharani and the party of Satyabhama.

Letter to Kirtanananda dasa, 13 April 1977
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 13
body:
As soon as we restrict people to material designations, we create certain expectations within ourselves as to how they should behave. The ability to see the spirit soul and his potential to serve Krishna is therefore infected by seeing in terms of material designations. That’s why it is offensive to see a Vaishnava according to some material designation.

April 13, 1992, Kaunas
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 14
body:
If the leading men of every city takes this example of installing Radha-Krishna deities in the home exactly as in our temple, then our preaching will be very successful.

Letter to Bhavananda dasa, 14 April 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 14
body:
Srimad Bhagavatam class is not meant for discussing politics, personal problems, local management, etc. Srimad Bhagavatam class is meant for deepening our attachment to hearing the transcendental pastimes and instructions of the Supreme Lord and His pure devotees. Such classes should inspire the proper service attitude towards the Supreme Personality of Godhead. If the speakers have an agenda that they want to communicate to the devotees, they should schedule regular (ishta-goshtis) for discussing such topics. Otherwise, each speaker should prepare his or her class nicely so that the devotees’ enthusiasm to attend Srimad-Bhagavatam class will increase.

April 14, 1999 Letter
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 15
body:
Regarding the presence of the soul, it is experienced by everyone as the living force or consciousness which gives the body life. When at the last stage of a man's life the doctor is feeling the pulse and then the beating stops, he says, "He is gone now.'' Who is gone? The complete bodily machinery remains, but the living soul has left it and the machinery stops working. Just as a machine is working so long the current is introduced into it and as soon as the electricity is removed the machine stops functioning. We know that there is electricity in the machine and that is making the machine run and we also perceive that the electric force is absent when the machine has stopped running. In this way the presence of the soul may be perceived directly by any thoughtful man.

Letter to Syamasundara, 15 April 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 15
body:
If one doesn’t work for purification of his heart, the result is that he falls into sense gratification.

April 15, 1999, Kishinev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 16
body:
BTG is my life and soul. Please therefore try to distribute BTG as many as it is possible. I wish to see that this magazine is published and distributed in the American way like "Readers Digest'', "Life'' etc., published in millions and distributed all over the world. Actually the position of BTG should be more important than any mundane magazine because it contains the quintessence of human necessities.

Letter to Gurudasa, 16 April 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 16
body:
Due to our condition, we are very quick to judge others’ behavior. And we are very quick to justify our own behavior - ‘I was right and he was wrong.’ This is the disease of the material world. This is actually the reason why we are in the material world, this very mentality.

April, 16, 1992, Riga
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 18
body:
All the wives of our students should be especially trained up for Deity worship and cooking, and when possible they should go outside on Sankirtana Party with their husbands and others.

Letter to Hamsaduta dasa, 18 April 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 18
body:
The nature of spiritual pleasure is real, whereas the nature of material pleasure is illusory. It looks like pleasure, but it’s not real pleasure because it has an end. And when it ends, it ends in misery.

April 18, 1999, Kishinev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 19
body:
Regarding Kartikeya's question about worshiping Lord Jagannatha, He should always be worshiped with awe and reverence. Krishna's picture as a Naughty Child should not be treated by us as a naughty child. We should always worship Krishna as the Supreme Lord.

Letter to Sudama and Kartikeya, 19 April 1969
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 19
body:
The devotee of the Lord is like a rain cloud because he is carrying so much water, so much mercy. But water is coming from the ocean. The rain cloud is not carrying its own water; it’s getting water from the whole ocean. In the same way, a devotee is not carrying his own mercy, he is carrying Krishna’s mercy.

April 19, 1992, St. Petersburg
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 20
body:
This ISKCON Press insignia is very appropriately drawn. It bears the real meaning of mrdanga or press and mrdanga are two parallel lines.

Letter to Brahmananda dasa, 20 April 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 20
body:
To the degree one actually surrenders to superior dictation, to that degree one gets help from within the heart from the Lord.

April 20, 1998, Kiev
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 21
body:
Regarding organization of the artists, there is no need of wasting time for learning the art from study of texts. We should always remember that our time is very short. I think our artists should be satisfied with whatever they have learned already, that is sufficient. They should be simply engaged in painting pictures always, and that will teach them the art sufficiently.

Letter to Satsvarupa dasa, 21 April 1970
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 22
body:
It is not so much important the quantity of books that we distribute, but that we serve Krishna as best we can, and depend on Him for the results. Transcendental competition is nice, but it should not come to the point of making us lose our Krishna consciousness.

Letter to Dharma, 22 April 1972
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 21
body:
Fruitive activities are an attempt to counteract suffering. That is what materialistic life is all about. It is just an artificial attempt to avoid pain.

April 21, 1994, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 22
body:
Real atonement means to awaken in one’s heart an attraction for the name, form, qualities, and pastimes of the Supreme Lord.

April 22, 1999, Dnepropetrovsk
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 23
body:
We should not distribute anyone else's book except our own.

Letter to Ramesvara Maharaja and Ranadira dasa, 23 April 1976
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 23
body:
There is no greater danger in this world than to forget Krishna. Therefore we have to be very, very careful that we don’t become too comfortable in this material world. Because if we become too comfortable, then there is always the risk that we are actually getting into that very dangerous position of forgetting Krishna.

April 23, 2008, Moscow
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 24
body:
The Gopis' position is always transcendental. They are above karmis, yogis and jnanis. They did not even try to understand Krishna whether He was God or not, but their love for Krishna was unparalleled. So one can love Krishna without any inquiry; that is the highest perfection. To know Krishna as God is not so exalted a position as to love Krishna without knowing. There is no comparison of worshiping of Krishna as conceived by the gopis that is only to love Krishna without any purpose.

Letter to Shekhar Prasad Shrestha, 24 April 1971
author: Srila Prabhupada

title: April 24
body:
When the Holy Name is uttered by a devotee who actually has taste for the Holy Name of the Lord, who sees Krishna present in the Holy Name of the Lord, who actually has love for Krishna, when such a devotee appears in this world he brings the Holy Name of the Lord with him. Wherever he vibrates the Holy Name of the Lord, everyone there has an opportunity to come in contact with Krishna.

April 24
author: Niranjana Swami

title: April 25
body:
Compare what you were before to what you have become, now challenge any other mantra to produce such effect. You know it, now try to realize it yourself and convince others, that is Krishna Consciousness.
